rule: OPTIONS 3 OPTIONS TRADING RULES
rule_cn: 3种选择期权交易规则

rule: Section 1. Hours of Business
rule_cn: 第1节 商业运营时间

rule: (a) The System operates and shall be available to accept bids and offers and orders from the time prior to market open specified by the Exchange on its website to market close on each business day, unless modified by NOM. Orders and bids and offers shall be open and available for execution as of 9:30 a.m. Eastern Time and shall close as of 4:00 p.m. Eastern Time except for option contracts on certain fund shares or broad-based indexes which will close as of 4:15 p.m. Eastern Time.
rule_cn: (a) 系统将按照交易所网站上规定的每个交易日市场开盘前的时间运行，并接受投标、报价和订单，除非另有NOM修改。订单、投标和报价自东部时间上午9:30起开放并可供执行，至东部时间下午4:00止，但某些基金份额或广泛指数期权合约的交易时间将延长至东部时间下午4:15。
trl:
rule 1
IF Time = 交易所网站规定的每个交易日市场开盘前的时间 AND (Action = 投标 OR Action = 报价 OR Action = 订单) AND NOT Event = NOM修改 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF Time in [09:30-16:00] AND (Action = 订单 OR Action = 投标 OR Action = 报价) AND Status = 开放 AND Status = 可供执行 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF (TradingInstrument = 某些基金份额 OR TradingInstrument = 广泛指数期权合约) AND Time in [09:30-16:15] AND (Action = 订单 OR Action = 投标 OR Action = 报价) AND Status = 开放 AND Status = 可供执行 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 时间 = 交易所网站规定的每个交易日市场开盘前的时间 and 事件 != NOM修改 and 操作 = 投标
then 结果 != 成功
rule 2
if 时间 = 交易所网站规定的每个交易日市场开盘前的时间 and 事件 != NOM修改 and 操作 = 报价
then 结果 != 成功
rule 3
if 时间 = 交易所网站规定的每个交易日市场开盘前的时间 and 事件 != NOM修改 and 操作 = 订单
then 结果 != 成功
rule 4
if 时间 notin [09:30-16:00] and 操作 = 订单 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 5
if 时间 notin [09:30-16:00] and 操作 = 投标 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 6
if 时间 notin [09:30-16:00] and 操作 = 报价 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 7
if 交易品种 = 某些基金份额 and 时间 in [09:30-16:15] and 操作 = 订单 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 8
if 交易品种 = 广泛指数期权合约 and 时间 in [09:30-16:15] and 操作 = 订单 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 9
if 交易品种 = 广泛指数期权合约 and 时间 in [09:30-16:15] and 操作 = 投标 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功
rule 10
if 交易品种 = 广泛指数期权合约 and 时间 in [09:30-16:15] and 操作 = 报价 and 状态 = 开放 and 状态 = 可供执行
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (b) Except for unusual conditions as may be determined by the Board, hours during which transactions in options on individual stocks may be made on NOM shall correspond to the normal business days and hours for business set forth in the rules of the primary market trading the securities underlying NOM options. Notwithstanding the foregoing, transactions may be effected in options contracts on Exchange-Traded Fund Shares, as defined in Options 4, Section 3(h); and in options contracts on exchange-traded notes including Index-Linked Securities, as defined in Options 4, Section 3(k), on NOM until 4:15 p.m.
rule_cn: (b) 除非董事会另有决定，NOM 上进行个股期权交易的时间应与在交易 NOM 期权所涉及证券的主板市场规定的正常营业日和营业时间相对应。尽管有上述规定，NOM 上仍可在下午4点15分之前进行交易，交易对象包括《期权第4条第3(h)款》中定义的交易所交易基金份额的期权合约，以及《期权第4条第3(k)款》中定义的交易所交易票据（包括指数挂钩证券）的期权合约。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND TradingInstrument = 个股期权 AND NOT Event = 董事会另有决定 AND Time = 主板市场正常营业日 AND Time = 主板市场营业时间 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Time < 16:15 AND (TradingInstrument = 交易所交易基金份额的期权合约 OR TradingInstrument = 交易所交易票据的期权合约 OR TradingInstrument = 指数挂钩证券的期权合约) THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 个股期权 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 = 主板市场正常营业日 and 时间 = 主板市场营业时间 and 事件 != 董事会另有决定
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 交易品种 = 交易所交易基金份额的期权合约 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 16:15
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 交易品种 = 交易所交易票据的期权合约 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 16:15
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 交易品种 = 指数挂钩证券的期权合约 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 16:15
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (c) NOM shall not be open for business as provided within General 3, Section 1030.
rule_cn: (c) NOM 不得按照第 3 章第 1030 条的规定开展营业活动。

rule: Section 2. Units of Trading and Meaning of Premium Quotes and Orders
rule_cn: 第二章 交易单位及溢价报价与订单含义

rule: (a) Units of Trading. The unit of trading in each series of options traded on NOM shall be the unit of trading established for that series by the Clearing Corporation pursuant to the Rules of the Clearing Corporation and the agreements of Nasdaq with the Clearing Corporation.
rule_cn: (a) 交易单位。在纳斯达克交易所交易的每一系列期权，其交易单位应为清算公司根据清算公司规则及纳斯达克与清算公司之间的协议，为该系列期权所确定的交易单位。

rule: (b) Meaning of Premium Quotes and Orders. Except as provided in paragraph (c), orders shall be expressed in terms of dollars per unit of the underlying security. For example, a bid of "5" shall represent a bid of $500 for an options contract having a unit of trading consisting of 100 shares of an underlying security, or a bid of $550 for an options contract having a unit of trading consisting of 110 shares of an underlying security.
rule_cn: (b) 期权报价和订单的含义。除非第（c）款另有规定，所有订单均应以每股基础证券的美元金额表示。例如，一个报价为“5”的买单，表示对于一份交易单位包含100股基础证券的期权合约，报价为500美元；或者对于一份交易单位包含110股基础证券的期权合约，报价为550美元。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 报价 OR Action = 订单 AND NOT Constraint = 第c款另有规定 AND Price = 每股基础证券的美元金额 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF Action = 报价 AND TradingDirection = 买入 AND Price = 5 AND TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND OperationPart = 交易单位 AND Quantity = 100股基础证券 THEN Price = 500美元

rule 3
IF Action = 报价 AND TradingDirection = 买入 AND Price = 5 AND TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND OperationPart = 交易单位 AND Quantity = 110股基础证券 THEN Price = 550美元
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 != 第c款另有规定 and 操作 = 报价 and 价格 = 每股基础证券的美元金额
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 != 第c款另有规定 and 操作 = 订单 and 价格 = 每股基础证券的美元金额
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 操作 = 报价 and 交易方向 = 买入 and 数量 = 100股基础证券 and 价格 = 5 and 操作部分 = 交易单位
then 价格 = 500美元
rule 4
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 操作 = 报价 and 交易方向 = 买入 and 数量 = 110股基础证券 and 价格 = 5 and 操作部分 = 交易单位
then 价格 = 550美元

rule: (c) Special Cases. Orders for an options contract for which NOM has established an adjusted unit of trading in accordance with Options 3, Section 2 shall be expressed in terms of dollars per 1/100 part of the total securities and/or other property constituting such adjusted unit of trading. For example, an offer of "3" shall represent an offer of $300 for an options contract having a unit of trading consisting of 100 shares of an underlying security plus ten (10) rights.
rule_cn: (c) 特殊情况。对于NOM根据第3节第2款已设定调整交易单位的期权合约的订单，应以每1/100份调整交易单位所对应的美元金额来表达。例如，报价“3”表示针对一个交易单位由100股标的证券加10项权利组成的期权合约，报价金额为300美元。

rule: (d) All options on foreign currencies where the underlying foreign currency is not the U.S. dollar shall have a minimum increment of $.01.
rule_cn: (d) 所有以非美元外币作为标的物的外汇期权，其最小变动单位应为0.01美元。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND Constraint = NOM根据第3节第2款已设定调整交易单位 AND Operation = 订单 AND Price = 报价 THEN Price = 每1/100份调整交易单位所对应的美元金额
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 约束 = NOM根据第3节第2款已设定调整交易单位 and 价格 = 报价 and Operation = 订单
then 价格 = 每1/100份调整交易单位所对应的美元金额

testcase.价格: 每1/100份调整交易单位所对应的美元金额

rule: (e) In the case of options on foreign currencies, all bids or offers shall be expressed in terms of U.S. dollars per unit of the underlying foreign currency. E.g., a bid of "3.25" for a premium on a $170 strike price option on the British pound shall represent a bid to pay $325 per option contract.
rule_cn: (e) 在涉及外币期权的情况下，所有报价或要约均应以每单位基础外币的美元金额表示。例如，对于英镑兑170美元执行价的期权，报价“3.25”表示每份期权合约支付325美元的报价。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingInstrument = 外汇期权 AND Constraint = 标的物 = 非美元外币 THEN Constraint = 最小变动单位 = 0.01美元
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 外汇期权 and 标的物 = 非美元外币
then 最小变动单位 = 0.01美元

rule: Section 3. Minimum Increments
rule_cn: 第3节 最小增量

rule: (a) The following minimum quoting incrementsshall apply to options contracts traded on the Exchange: (1) If the options series is trading at less than $3.00, five (5) cents; (2) If the options series is trading at $3.00 or higher, ten (10) cents; and (3) For options series traded pursuant to the Penny Interval Program as described in Supplementary Material .01 to Options 3, Section 3: (A) one cent ($0.01) for all options series in QQQ, SPY, and IWM; (B) one cent ($0.01) for all other options series included in the Penny Interval Program that are trading at less than $3.00; and (C) five cents ($0.05) for all other options series included in the Penny Interval Program that are trading at or above $3.00.
rule_cn:
(a) 在交易所交易的期权合约应适用以下最低报价变动单位：  
(1) 如果该期权系列的交易价格低于3.00美元，则最低报价变动单位为5美分（$0.05）；  
(2) 如果该期权系列的交易价格等于或高于3.00美元，则最低报价变动单位为10美分（$0.10）；  
(3) 对于根据补充材料第01部分（Options 3，第3节）中描述的“便士间隔计划”进行交易的期权系列：  
(A) 所有属于QQQ、SPY和IWM的期权系列，最低报价变动单位为1美分（$0.01）；  
(B) 所有其他包含在“便士间隔计划”中的期权系列，若其交易价格低于3.00美元，则最低报价变动单位为1美分（$0.01）；  
(C) 所有其他包含在“便士间隔计划”中的期权系列，若其交易价格等于或高于3.00美元，则最低报价变动单位为5美分（$0.05）。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Price < 3.00 AND Constraint != 便士间隔计划 THEN Result = 0.05

rule 2
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Price >= 3.00 AND Constraint != 便士间隔计划 THEN Result = 0.10

rule 3
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Constraint = 便士间隔计划 AND (OperationPart = QQQ OR OperationPart = SPY OR OperationPart = IWM) THEN Result = 0.01

rule 4
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Constraint = 便士间隔计划 AND OperationPart != QQQ and OperationPart != SPY and OperationPart != IWM AND Price < 3.00 THEN Result = 0.01

rule 5
IF TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Constraint = 便士间隔计划 AND OperationPart != QQQ and OperationPart != SPY and OperationPart != IWM AND Price >= 3.00 THEN Result = 0.05
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 != 便士间隔计划 and 价格 < 3.00
then 结果 = 0.05
rule 2
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 != 便士间隔计划 and 价格 >= 3.00
then 结果 = 0.10
rule 3
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 便士间隔计划 and 操作部分 = QQQ
then 结果 = 0.01
rule 4
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 便士间隔计划 and 操作部分 = SPY
then 结果 = 0.01
rule 5
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 便士间隔计划 and 操作部分 = IWM
then 结果 = 0.01
rule 6
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 便士间隔计划 and 价格 < 3.00 and 操作部分 != QQQ and 操作部分 != SPY and 操作部分 != IWM
then 结果 = 0.01
rule 7
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 便士间隔计划 and 价格 >= 3.00 and 操作部分 != QQQ and 操作部分 != SPY and 操作部分 != IWM
then 结果 = 0.05

rule: (b) The minimum trading increment for options contracts traded on NOM will be one (1) cent for all series.
rule_cn: (b) 在NOM交易的期权合约的最小交易单位将为所有系列的1美分。
trl: IF TradingMarket = NOM AND TradingInstrument = 期权合约 AND OperationPart = 最小交易单位 THEN Price = 1美分
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 期权合约 and 交易市场 = NOM and 操作部分 = 最小交易单位
then 价格 = 1美分

rule: (c) A quote submitted to the System with an invalid trading increment will be re-priced. The quote will be rounded up to the nearest valid minimum price variation for offers and rounded down for bids.
rule_cn: (c) 若提交给系统的报价包含无效的交易价位变动，则该报价将被重新定价。报价将根据报价类型进行四舍五入：报价为卖盘时，将向上四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位；报价为买盘时，将向下四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位。
trl:
rule 1
IF OperationPart = 报价 AND Event = 提交给系统 AND Constraint = 包含无效的交易价位变动 THEN Action = 重新定价

rule 2
IF OperationPart = 报价 AND TradingDirection = 卖出 AND Action = 重新定价 THEN Constraint = 向上四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位

rule 3
IF OperationPart = 报价 AND TradingDirection = 买入 AND Action = 重新定价 THEN Constraint = 向下四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 包含无效的交易价位变动 and 事件 = 提交给系统 and 操作部分 = 报价
then 操作 = 重新定价
rule 2
if 操作 = 重新定价 and 交易方向 = 卖出 and 操作部分 = 报价
then 约束 = 向上四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位
rule 3
if 操作 = 重新定价 and 交易方向 = 买入 and 操作部分 = 报价
then 约束 = 向下四舍五入至最近的有效最小价格变动单位

testcase.事件: 提交给系统
提交给系统

rule: Supplementary Material to Options 3, Section 3: .01 Requirements for Penny Interval Program. The Exchange will list option classes for the Penny Interval Program (“Penny Program”) with minimum quoting requirements (“penny increments”) of one cent ($0.01) and five cents ($0.05), as set forth in Options 3, Section 3(a)(3)(A) - (C). The list of the option classes included in the Penny Program will be announced by the Exchange via Options Trader Alert and published by the Exchange on its website.
rule_cn: 选项3第3节补充材料：3.01 美分间隔计划要求。交易所将列出适用于美分间隔计划（“美分计划”）的期权类别，其最低报价要求（“美分单位”）为1美分（$0.01）和5美分（$0.05），具体规定详见选项3第3(a)(3)(A)至(C)条。交易所将通过期权交易警报公布纳入美分计划的期权类别清单，并将其发布在其官方网站上。

rule: (a) Initial Selection. On the first trading day of the third full calendar month after April 1, 2020, the Penny Program will apply only to the 363 most actively traded multiply listed option classes, based on OCC’s National Cleared Volume in the six full calendar months ending in the month of approval, that (i) currently quote in penny increments, or (ii) overlie securities priced below $200, or any index at an index level below $200. Eligibility for inclusion in the Penny Program will be determined at the close of trading on the monthly Expiration Friday of the second full month following April 1, 2020.
rule_cn: （a）初始选择。在2020年4月1日后第三个完整日历月的第一个交易日， penny计划仅适用于在批准当月结束的前六个月完整日历月中，根据OCC全国清算成交量排名前363位的、多市场上市期权类别，这些类别满足以下任一条件：（i）当前以便士（即最小价格变动单位）报价，或（ii）覆盖的证券价格低于200美元，或任何指数在指数水平低于200美元。在2020年4月1日后第二个完整月份的每月到期星期五交易收盘时，将确定其是否符合进入penny计划的资格。

rule: (b) Annual Review. Commencing in December 2020 and each December thereafter, OCC will rank all multiply listed option classes based on National Cleared Volume for the six full calendar months from June 1 through November 30 for determination of the most actively traded option classes.
rule_cn: (b) 年度审查。自2020年12月起，每年12月开始，OCC将根据6个完整日历月份（即6月1日至11月30日）的全国清算成交量，对所有多市场挂牌期权类别进行排名，以确定交易最活跃的期权类别。

rule: (1) Addition to the Penny Program. Based on the Annual Review, any option class not in the Penny Program that is among the 300 most actively traded multiply listed option classes overlying securities priced below $200, or an index at an index level below $200, will be added to the Penny Program on the first trading day of January.
rule_cn: （1）便士计划的补充。根据年度审查结果，任何未列入便士计划的期权类别，如果其标的证券价格低于200美元，且该期权类别是300只最活跃交易的多市场挂牌期权类别之一，或者该期权类别对应的是指数且指数水平低于200美元，则将在1月的第一个交易日被加入便士计划。

rule: (2) Removal from the Penny Program. Except as provided in (c), (d), (e) and (f) below, based on the Annual Review, any option class in the Penny Program that falls outside the 425 most actively traded multiply listed option classes will be removed from the Penny Program on the first trading day of April.
rule_cn: （2）从“便士计划”中移除。除本条（c）、（d）、（e）和（f）另有规定外，根据年度审查，任何在“便士计划”中交易量低于前425个最活跃的多市场挂牌期权类别的期权类别，将在4月的第一个交易日被移除出“便士计划”。

rule: (c) Newly listed Option Classes. The Exchange may add to the Penny Program a newly listed option class provided that (i) it is among the 300 most actively traded multiply listed option classes, as ranked by National Cleared Volume at OCC, in its first full calendar month of trading and (ii) the underlying security is priced below $200 or the underlying index is at an index level below $200. Any option class added under this provision will be added on the first trading day of the month after it qualifies and will remain in the Penny Program for one full calendar year, after which it will be subject to the Annual Review stated in section (b) above.
rule_cn: （c）新上市的期权类别。交易所可以将新上市的期权类别纳入便士计划，但须满足以下条件：（i）在该期权类别首次完整交易月内，其交易量位列全国清算量（OCC）排名前300名的多市场上市期权类别之一；（ii）标的证券的价格低于200美元，或标的指数的指数水平低于200美元。根据本条款新增的任何期权类别，将在其符合条件后的下一个月首个交易日被加入便士计划，并在该计划中持续一年，之后将按照上述（b）条款中所述的年度审查程序进行审查。

rule: (d) Classes with Significant Growth in Activity. The Exchange may add any option class to the Penny Program, provided that (i) it is among the 75 most actively traded multiply listed option classes, as ranked by National Cleared Volume at OCC, in the past six full calendar months of trading and (ii) the underlying security is priced below $200 or the underlying index is at an index level below $200. Any option class added under this provision will be added on the first trading day of the second full month after it qualifies and will remain in the Penny Program for the rest of the calendar year, after which it will be subject to the Annual Review stated in section (b) above.
rule_cn: (d) 活跃度显著增长的类别。交易所可将任何期权类别加入“便士计划”，但需满足以下条件：(i) 该期权类别在过去六个月完整的交易日中，按OCC的全国清算成交量排名，位列前75名的多市场挂牌期权类别；(ii) 其标的证券价格低于200美元，或其标的指数处于低于200点的水平。根据本条款加入“便士计划”的任何期权类别，将在其符合条件后的第二个月的第一个交易日加入该计划，并在该日之后的整个财年中保留在“便士计划”中，之后将按照上述(b)节所述的年度审查程序进行审查。

rule: (e) Corporate Actions. If a corporate action involves one or more option classes in the Penny Program, all adjusted and unadjusted series of the option class will be included in the Penny Program. Any new option class added to the Penny Program under this provision will remain in the Penny Program for at least one full calendar year, after which it will be subject to the Annual Review stated in section (b) above.
rule_cn: (e) 公司行为。如果公司行为涉及 Penny 计划中的一个或多个期权类别，那么该期权类别的所有调整后和未调整的系列都将纳入 Penny 计划。根据本条款新增加入 Penny 计划的任何期权类别，将至少保留一年完整的日历年度，之后将按照上述 (b) 条款中所述的年度审查程序进行审查。

rule: (f) Delisted or Ineligible Option Classes. Any series in an option class participating in the Penny Program in which the underlying security has been delisted, or are identified by OCC as ineligible for opening customer transactions, will continue to quote pursuant to the terms of the Penny Program until all such options have expired.
rule_cn: (f) 被摘牌或不符合资格的期权系列。任何参与便士计划的期权系列，如果其标的证券已被摘牌，或被OCC认定为不符合开展客户交易的资格，将继续按照便士计划的条款进行报价，直至所有此类期权全部到期。

rule: Section 4. Entry and Display of Quotes
rule_cn: 第4节 报价的输入与显示

rule: (a) All bids or offers made and accepted on NOM in accordance with the NOM Rules shall constitute binding contracts, subject to applicable requirements of the Rules of the Exchange and the Rules of the Clearing Corporation.
rule_cn: (a) 在按照NOM规则在NOM系统上提交并接受的所有报价或要约均构成具有约束力的合同，但须符合交易所规则和清算公司规则的相关要求。

rule: (b) Quotes are subject to the following requirements and conditions:
rule_cn: (b) 引用需符合以下要求和条件：

rule: (1) Market Makers may generate and submit option quotations.
rule_cn: (1) 市场做市商可以生成并提交期权报价。
trl:
rule 1
IF Actor = 市场做市商 AND Action = 生成 AND Action = 提交 AND OperationPart = 期权报价 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 市场做市商 and 操作 = 生成 and 操作 = 提交 and 操作部分 = 期权报价
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (2) The System shall time-stamp a quote which shall determine the time ranking of the quote for purposes of processing the quote.
rule_cn: （2）系统应为报价添加时间戳，以确定报价的排序时间，用于处理报价。
trl: IF Action = 处理报价 AND OperationPart = 报价 THEN Result = 成功 AND Constraint = 添加时间戳 AND Constraint = 确定报价的排序时间
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作 = 处理报价 and 操作部分 = 报价
then 约束 = 添加时间戳 and 约束 = 确定报价的排序时间 and 结果 = 成功

rule: (3) Market Makers may enter bids and/or offers in the form of a two-sided quote. Only one quote may be submitted at a time for an option series. Quotes may be submitted as a bulk message.
rule_cn: （3）做市商可以以双边报价的形式提交报价和/或要约。对于一个期权系列，每次只能提交一个报价。报价可以以批量消息的形式提交。
trl:
rule 1
IF Actor = 做市商 AND (Action = 提交报价 OR Action = 提交要约) AND TradingMethod = 双边报价 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF Actor = 做市商 AND TradingInstrument = 期权系列 AND Action = 提交报价 AND Quantity = 1 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF Actor = 做市商 AND Action = 提交报价 AND TradingMethod = 批量消息 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 做市商 and 操作 = 提交报价 and 交易方式 = 双边报价
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 做市商 and 操作 = 提交要约 and 交易方式 = 双边报价
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 做市商 and 交易品种 = 期权系列 and 操作 = 提交报价 and 数量 = 1
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 操作主体 = 做市商 and 操作 = 提交报价 and 交易方式 = 批量消息
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (i) A “bulk message” means a single electronic message submitted to the Exchange which may contain a specified number of quotations as designated by the Exchange. The bulk message, submitted via SQF, may enter, modify, or cancel quotes. Bulk messages are handled by the System in the same manner as it handles a single quote message.
rule_cn: (i) “批量消息”是指提交至交易所的单条电子消息，该消息可能包含交易所指定数量的报价。通过SQF提交的批量消息可以录入、修改或撤销报价。系统对批量消息的处理方式与处理单条报价消息的方式相同。

rule: (4) The System accepts quotes beginning at a time specified by the Exchange and communicated on the Exchange's web site.
rule_cn: （4）系统接受在交易所指定的时间开始的报价，该时间通过交易所网站进行公布。

rule: (5) Firm Quote. When quotes in options on another market or markets are subject to relief from the firm quote requirement set forth in the SEC Quote Rule, orders and quotes will receive an automatic execution at or better than the NBBO based on the best bid or offer in markets whose quotes are not subject to such relief. Such determination may be made by way of notification from another market that its quotes are not firm or are unreliable; administrative message from the Option Price Reporting Authority ("OPRA"); quotes received from another market designated as "not firm" using the appropriate indicator; and/or telephonic or electronic inquiry to, and verification from, another market that its quotes are not firm. The Exchange shall maintain a record of each instance in which another exchange's quotes are excluded from the Exchange's calculation of NBBO, and shall notify such other exchange that its quotes have been so excluded. Where quotes in options on another market or markets previously subject to relief from the firm quote requirement set forth in the Quote Rule are no longer subject to such relief, such quotations will be included in the calculation of NBBO for such options. Such determination may be made by way of notification from another market that its quotes are firm; administrative message from OPRA; and/or telephonic or electronic inquiry to, and verification from, another market that its quotes are firm.
rule_cn: （5）固定报价。当其他市场或多个市场中的报价受到证券交易委员会（SEC）报价规则中关于固定报价要求的豁免时，订单和报价将根据不受此类豁免的市场中的最佳买价或卖价，自动以或优于全国最佳报价（NBBO）的价格执行。该判断可通过以下方式作出：另一市场通知其报价不固定或不可靠；期权价格报告机构（OPRA）发出的行政信息；通过适当指示标明为“非固定报价”的另一市场报价；以及通过电话或电子方式向另一市场查询并核实其报价是否为非固定报价。交易所应记录每次其他交易所的报价被排除在交易所NBBO计算之外的情况，并通知该交易所其报价已被排除。如果之前受到SEC报价规则中固定报价要求豁免的其他市场或多个市场中的报价不再受此类豁免，则这些报价将纳入相应期权的NBBO计算。该判断可通过以下方式作出：另一市场通知其报价为固定报价；OPRA发出的行政信息；以及通过电话或电子方式向另一市场查询并核实其报价是否为固定报价。

rule: (6) Trade-Through Compliance and Locked or Crossed Markets. A quote will not be executed at a price that trades through another market or displayed at a price that would lock or cross another market. If, at the time of entry, a quote would cause a locked or crossed market violation or would cause a trade-through, violation, it will be re-priced to the current national best offer (for bids) or the current national best bid (for offers) as non-displayed and displayed at one minimum price variance above (for offers) or below (for bids) the national best price.
rule_cn: （6）交易穿透合规与锁定或交叉市场。报价不得以穿透其他市场交易的价格成交，也不得以导致其他市场出现锁定或交叉的价格显示。如果在报价输入时，该报价会导致锁定或交叉市场违规，或造成交易穿透违规，则该报价将被重新定价为当前全国最优卖价（针对买价报价）或当前全国最优买价（针对卖价报价），并以全国最优价格之上（针对卖价报价）或之下（针对买价报价）最小价格差异的价格进行非显示性报价和显示性报价。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 报价 AND OperationPart = 穿透其他市场交易的价格 AND Action = 成交 THEN Result = 失败

rule 2
IF Action = 报价 AND OperationPart = 导致其他市场出现锁定或交叉的价格 AND Action = 显示 THEN Result = 失败

rule 3
IF Action = 报价输入 AND Event = 导致锁定或交叉市场违规 OR Event = 造成交易穿透违规 AND TradingDirection = 买入 THEN Action = 重新定价 AND Price = 当前全国最优卖价 AND Action = 非显示性报价 AND Action = 显示性报价 AND Price = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差异

rule 4
IF Action = 报价输入 AND Event = 导致锁定或交叉市场违规 OR Event = 造成交易穿透违规 AND TradingDirection = 卖出 THEN Action = 重新定价 AND Price = 当前全国最优买价 AND Action = 非显示性报价 AND Action = 显示性报价 AND Price = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差异
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作 = 报价 and 操作 = 成交 and 操作部分 = 穿透其他市场交易的价格
then 结果 = 失败
rule 2
if 操作 = 报价 and 操作 = 显示 and 操作部分 = 导致其他市场出现锁定或交叉的价格
then 结果 = 失败
rule 3
if 事件 = 导致锁定或交叉市场违规 and 操作 = 报价输入 and 交易方向 = 买入
then 操作 = 重新定价 and 操作 = 非显示性报价 and 操作 = 显示性报价 and 价格 = 当前全国最优卖价 and 价格 = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差异
rule 4
if 事件 = 造成交易穿透违规 and 操作 = 报价输入 and 交易方向 = 买入
then 操作 = 重新定价 and 操作 = 非显示性报价 and 操作 = 显示性报价 and 价格 = 当前全国最优卖价 and 价格 = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差异
rule 5
if 事件 = 导致锁定或交叉市场违规 and 操作 = 报价输入 and 交易方向 = 卖出
then 操作 = 重新定价 and 操作 = 非显示性报价 and 操作 = 显示性报价 and 价格 = 当前全国最优买价 and 价格 = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差异
rule 6
if 事件 = 造成交易穿透违规 and 操作 = 报价输入 and 交易方向 = 卖出
then 操作 = 重新定价 and 操作 = 非显示性报价 and 操作 = 显示性报价 and 价格 = 当前全国最优买价 and 价格 = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差异

rule: (7) The System automatically executes eligible quotes using the Exchange's displayed best bid and offer (“BBO”) or the Exchange’s non-displayed order book (“internal BBO”) if the best bid and/or offer on the Exchange has been repriced pursuant to Options 3, Section 5(d) below and subsection (6) above.
rule_cn: （7）如果根据下文第5（d）款第3项及上述第（6）款的规定，交易所的最佳买价和卖价（“BBO”）或非显示订单簿（“内部BBO”）已被重新报价，系统将自动执行符合条件的报价，使用交易所显示的最佳买价和卖价（“BBO”）或交易所的非显示订单簿（“内部BBO”）。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = 交易所的最佳买价和卖价已被重新报价 OR Event = 非显示订单簿已被重新报价 AND Constraint = 根据下文第5(d)款第3项及上述第(6)款的规定 AND Action = 自动执行 AND OperationPart = 符合条件的报价 AND (OperationPart = 交易所显示的最佳买价和卖价 OR OperationPart = 交易所的非显示订单簿) THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 根据下文第5d款第3项及上述第6款的规定 and 事件 = 交易所的最佳买价和卖价已被重新报价 and 操作 = 自动执行 and 操作部分 = 符合条件的报价 and 操作部分 = 交易所显示的最佳买价和卖价
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 = 根据下文第5d款第3项及上述第6款的规定 and 事件 = 非显示订单簿已被重新报价 and 操作 = 自动执行 and 操作部分 = 符合条件的报价 and 操作部分 = 交易所显示的最佳买价和卖价
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 约束 = 根据下文第5d款第3项及上述第6款的规定 and 事件 = 非显示订单簿已被重新报价 and 操作 = 自动执行 and 操作部分 = 符合条件的报价 and 操作部分 = 交易所的非显示订单簿
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (8) Quotes submitted to the System are subject to following: risk protections provided for in Options 3, Section 15. Quotes submitted with minimum increments that are not valid pursuant to Options 3, Section 3 will be rounded up to the nearest minimum price variation for offers and rounded down to the nearest minimum price variation for bids.
rule_cn: （8）提交至系统的报价需遵守以下规定：第15条中规定的风险保护措施。根据第3条，若提交的报价最小变动单位不符合要求，则报价单的报价部分将向上取整至最近的最小价格变动单位，而报价单的报价部分将向下取整至最近的最小价格变动单位。

rule: (c) Quotes will be displayed in the System as described in Options 3, Section 23.
rule_cn: (c) 引用内容将按照第23节选项3中所述方式在系统中显示。

rule: Section 5. Entry and Display of Orders
rule_cn: 第5节 订单的输入与显示

rule: (a) Participants can enter orders into the System, subject to the following requirements and conditions:
rule_cn: (a) 参与者可以向系统提交订单，但需遵守以下要求和条件：

rule: (1) Participants shall be permitted to transmit to the System multiple orders at single as well as multiple price levels.
rule_cn: （1）参与者应被允许向系统发送多个订单，这些订单可以是单一价格水平或多个价格水平的。
trl: IF Actor = 参与者 AND Action = 发送 AND OperationPart = 订单 AND Quantity = 多个 AND (Constraint = 单一价格水平 OR Constraint = 多个价格水平) THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 参与者 and 约束 = 单一价格水平 and 操作 = 发送 and 数量 = 多个 and 操作部分 = 订单
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 参与者 and 约束 = 多个价格水平 and 操作 = 发送 and 数量 = 多个 and 操作部分 = 订单
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (2) The System accepts orders beginning at a time specified by the Exchange and communicated on the Exchange's web site.
rule_cn: （2）系统在交易所指定的时间开始接受订单，该时间通过交易所网站进行公布。

rule: (3) The System shall time-stamp an order which shall determine the time ranking of the order for purposes of processing the order.
rule_cn: (3) 系统应为每笔订单添加时间戳，以确定订单的处理顺序。
trl: IF Action = 添加 AND OperationPart = 时间戳 AND OperationPart = 每笔订单 THEN Result = 成功 AND Constraint = 确定订单的处理顺序
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作 = 添加 and 操作部分 = 时间戳 and 操作部分 = 每笔订单
then 约束 = 确定订单的处理顺序 and 结果 = 成功

rule: (4) Orders submitted to the System are subject to the following: risk protections within Options 3, Section 15 and the restrictions of order types within Options 3, Section 7. Orders may execute at multiple prices.
rule_cn: （4）提交至系统的订单受以下条款约束：选项3第15节中的风险保护措施以及选项3第7节中的订单类型限制。订单可能以多个价格成交。

rule: (5) Nullification by Mutual Agreement. Trades may be nullified if all parties participating in the trade agree to the nullification.
rule_cn: （5）通过协商一致取消交易。如果参与交易的所有方同意取消交易，则该交易可以被取消。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 协商一致 AND Action = 取消交易 AND Constraint = 所有参与交易方同意取消交易 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 所有参与交易方同意取消交易 and 操作 = 协商一致 and 操作 = 取消交易
then 结果 = 成功

rule: In such case, one party must notify the Exchange and the Exchange promptly will disseminate the nullification to OPRA. It is considered conduct inconsistent with just and equitable principles of trade for a party to use the mutual adjustment process to circumvent any applicable Exchange rule, the Act or any of the rules and regulations thereunder.
rule_cn: 在这种情况下，一方必须通知交易所，交易所将及时向OPRA发布该取消交易。任何一方利用相互调整程序规避适用的交易所规则、本法或其下属的任何规则和规定的做法，被视为与贸易的公正和公平原则相违背的行为。

rule: (b) NBBO Price Protection. Orders, other than Intermarket Sweep Orders (as defined in Rule Options 5, Section 1(8) will not be automatically executed by the System at prices inferior to the NBBO (as defined in Options 5, Section 1(10)). There is no NBBO price protection with respect to any other market whose quotations are Non-Firm (as defined in Options 5, Section 1 (11)).
rule_cn: (b) NBBO价格保护。除市场间扫盘指令（如规则选项5第1(8)节所定义）外，系统不会自动以低于NBBO（如选项5第1(10)节所定义）的价格执行其他指令。对于任何报价为非固定报价（如选项5第1(11)节所定义）的其他市场，均不提供NBBO价格保护。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = NBBO价格保护 AND TradingMethod != 市场间扫盘指令 AND Price < NBBO AND Action = 执行 THEN Result = 失败

rule 2
IF Event = NBBO价格保护 AND TradingMarket = 其他市场 AND Status != 固定报价 THEN Result = 失败
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 事件 = NBBO价格保护 and 操作 = 执行 and 交易方式 != 市场间扫盘指令 and 价格 < NBBO
then 结果 = 失败
rule 2
if 交易市场 = 其他市场 and 事件 = NBBO价格保护 and 状态 != 固定报价
then 结果 = 失败

testcase.事件: NBBO价格保护
NBBO价格保护
NBBO价格保护

rule: (c) The System automatically executes eligible orders using the Exchange's displayed best bid and offer ("BBO") or the Exchange's non-displayed order book ("internal BBO") if the best bid and/or offer on the Exchange has been repriced pursuant to subsection (d) below and Options 3, Section 4(b)(6) above. The contract size associated with Displayed Price Improving Orders to buy (sell) are displayed at the MPV below (above) the price of the Price Improving Order. Price Improving Orders will not be permitted to create a locked or crossed market or to cause a trade through violation.
rule_cn: (c) 如果根据下文第(d)款以及上述第4(b)(6)条选项3，交易所的最优买价和卖价（“BBO”）或非显示订单簿（“内部BBO”）已被重新报价，系统将自动执行符合条件的订单。显示价格改善订单（买入或卖出）的合约规模将显示在价格改善订单价格的上方或下方（以MPV为准）。价格改善订单不得导致市场锁定或交叉，也不得通过违规行为促成交易。

rule: (d) Trade-Through Compliance and Locked or Crossed Markets. An order will not be executed at a price that trades through another market or displayed at a price that would lock or cross another market. An order that is designated by the member as routable will be routed in compliance with applicable Trade-Through and Locked and Crossed Markets restrictions.
rule_cn: (d) 交易穿透合规与锁定或交叉市场。订单不得以穿透其他市场的价格成交，也不得以可能锁定或交叉其他市场的价格显示。会员指定为可路由的订单，应按照适用的交易穿透和锁定或交叉市场限制进行路由。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 成交 AND Price = 穿透其他市场的价格 THEN Result = 失败

rule 2
IF Action = 显示 AND Price = 可能锁定或交叉其他市场的价格 THEN Result = 失败

rule 3
IF Actor = 会员 AND Status = 指定为可路由 AND OperationPart = 订单 AND Constraint = 交易穿透和锁定或交叉市场限制 AND Action = 路由 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作 = 成交 and 价格 = 穿透其他市场的价格
then 结果 = 失败
rule 2
if 操作 = 显示 and 价格 = 可能锁定或交叉其他市场的价格
then 结果 = 失败
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 会员 and 约束 = 交易穿透和锁定或交叉市场限制 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作部分 = 订单 and 状态 = 指定为可路由
then 结果 = 成功

testcase.价格: 可能锁定或交叉其他市场的价格
可能锁定或交叉其他市场的价格

rule: An order that is designated by a member as non-routable will be re-priced in order to comply with applicable Trade-Through and Locked and Crossed Markets restrictions. If, at the time of entry, an order that the entering party has elected not to make eligible for routing would cause a locked or crossed market violation or would cause a trade-through violation, it will be re-priced to the current national best offer (for bids) or the current national best bid (for offers) as non-displayed and displayed at one minimum price variance above (for offers) or below (for bids) the national best price.
rule_cn: 如果会员将订单标记为不可路由，则系统将对该订单重新定价，以符合适用的交易穿透（Trade-Through）和锁定市场（Locked Market）及交叉市场（Crossed Market）限制。如果在订单录入时，该录入方选择不将其订单纳入路由范围，而该订单会导致锁定市场或交叉市场违规，或导致交易穿透违规，那么该订单将被重新定价为当前全国最优卖价（适用于买盘）或当前全国最优买价（适用于卖盘），并以全国最优价格之上（适用于卖盘）或之下（适用于买盘）最小价格差的价格进行显示。
trl:
rule 1
IF Actor = 会员 AND Action = 标记 AND OperationPart = 订单 AND Constraint = 不可路由 THEN Action = 重新定价 AND Constraint = 符合交易穿透限制 AND Constraint = 符合锁定市场限制 AND Constraint = 符合交叉市场限制

rule 2
IF Actor = 录入方 AND Action = 选择不纳入路由范围 AND Event = 订单录入时 AND (Constraint = 导致锁定市场违规 OR Constraint = 导致交叉市场违规 OR Constraint = 导致交易穿透违规) AND TradingDirection = 买入 THEN Price = 当前全国最优卖价 AND Price = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差 AND Status = 显示

rule 3
IF Actor = 录入方 AND Action = 选择不纳入路由范围 AND Event = 订单录入时 AND (Constraint = 导致锁定市场违规 OR Constraint = 导致交叉市场违规 OR Constraint = 导致交易穿透违规) AND TradingDirection = 卖出 THEN Price = 当前全国最优买价 AND Price = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差 AND Status = 显示
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 会员 and 约束 = 不可路由 and 操作 = 标记 and 操作部分 = 订单
then 约束 = 符合交易穿透限制 and 约束 = 符合锁定市场限制 and 约束 = 符合交叉市场限制 and 操作 = 重新定价
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致锁定市场违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 买入
then 价格 = 当前全国最优卖价 and 价格 = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致交叉市场违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 买入
then 价格 = 当前全国最优卖价 and 价格 = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示
rule 4
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致交易穿透违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 买入
then 价格 = 当前全国最优卖价 and 价格 = 全国最优卖价之下最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示
rule 5
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致锁定市场违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 卖出
then 价格 = 当前全国最优买价 and 价格 = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示
rule 6
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致交叉市场违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 卖出
then 价格 = 当前全国最优买价 and 价格 = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示
rule 7
if 操作主体 = 录入方 and 约束 = 导致交易穿透违规 and 事件 = 订单录入时 and 操作 = 选择不纳入路由范围 and 交易方向 = 卖出
then 价格 = 当前全国最优买价 and 价格 = 全国最优买价之上最小价格差 and 状态 = 显示

rule: (e) Orders will be displayed in the System as described in Options 3, Section 23.
rule_cn: (e) 订单将在系统中按照第23节选项3所述的方式显示。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 显示 AND Constraint = 第23节选项3所述的方式 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 第23节选项3所述的方式 and 操作 = 显示
then 结果 = 成功

rule: Section 6. Unusual Market Conditions
rule_cn: 第6节 不寻常的市场状况

rule: (a) NOM Options staff may determine that the level of trading activities or the existence of unusual market conditions is such that NOM Options is incapable of collecting, processing, and making available to quotation vendors the data for the option in a manner that accurately reflects the current state of the market on NOM Options. Upon making such a determination, NOM Regulation shall designate the market in such option to be "fast." When a market for an option is declared fast, NOM Regulation will provide notice that NOM Options quotations are not firm by appending an appropriate indicator to the NOM Options quotations.
rule_cn: (a) NOM 期权交易员可判断，交易活动水平或存在异常市场状况，使得NOM 期权无法以准确反映NOM 期权市场当前状态的方式，收集、处理并提供期权的行情数据给报价供应商。作出此类判断后，NOM 规则将认定该期权市场为“快速市场”。当某一期权市场被宣布为“快速市场”时，NOM 规则将通过在NOM 期权报价上附加适当的标识，通知市场NOM 期权报价并非最终报价。

rule: (b) If a market is declared fast, Nasdaq Regulation shall have the power to do one or more of the following with respect to the class or classes involved: (1) Suspend the minimum size requirement as permitted under Options 2, Section 5 (Market Maker Quotations) of these Rules. (2) Take such other actions as are deemed in the interest of maintaining a fair and orderly market.
rule_cn:
(b) 如果某市场被宣布为快速市场，纳斯达克法规机构有权针对涉及的证券类别采取下列一种或多种措施：  
(1) 暂停根据本规则第5条（做市商报价）第2款（选项2）所允许的最低交易规模要求。  
(2) 采取其他被认为有助于维护公平、有序市场的措施。

rule: (c) Nasdaq Regulation will monitor the activity or conditions that caused a fast market to be declared, and shall review the condition of such market at least every thirty (30) minutes. Regular trading procedures shall be resumed when NOM determines that the conditions supporting a fast market declaration no longer exist. Nasdaq Regulation will provide notice that its quotations are once again firm by removing the indicator from the NOM quotations.
rule_cn: (c) 纳斯达克监管机构将监控导致快速市场声明的活动或状况，并至少每三十（30）分钟审查该市场的状况。当纳斯达克市场运营中心（NOM）确定支持快速市场声明的条件不再存在时，将恢复正常的交易程序。纳斯达克监管机构将通过从NOM报价中移除该指示器，通知市场其报价已恢复有效。

rule: (d) If the conditions supporting a fast market declaration cannot be managed utilizing one or more of the procedures contained in this Rule, then Nasdaq Regulation, shall instruct Nasdaq operations to halt trading in the class or classes so affected.
rule_cn: (d) 如果无法通过本规则中所包含的一个或多个程序来满足快速市场声明的条件，那么纳斯达克规章应指示纳斯达克运营部门暂停受影响的股票类别或类别的交易。

rule: (e) Nasdaq Regulation shall instruct Nasdaq operations to halt trading in all options whenever a market-wide trading halt is initiated on the New York Stock Exchange (commonly known as a "circuit breaker") in response to extraordinary market conditions.
rule_cn: (e) 纳斯达克规则应指示纳斯达克运营方，在纽约证券交易所（通常称为“熔断机制”）因特殊市场情况而启动市场范围交易暂停时，暂停所有期权的交易。

rule: Section 7. Types of Orders and Order and Quote Protocols The Exchange may determine to make certain order types and time-in-force, respectively, available on a class or System basis.
rule_cn: 第七节 订单类型及订单与报价协议 交易所可决定在特定类别或系统基础上，提供某些订单类型及有效时间规则。

rule: (a) The term "Order" shall mean a single order submitted to the System by a Participant that is eligible to submit such orders.
rule_cn: （a）“订单”一词指参与者提交给系统的单个订单，该参与者具备提交此类订单的资格。

rule: The term "Order Type" shall mean the unique processing prescribed for designated orders that are eligible for entry into the System, and shall include:
rule_cn: “订单类型”一词是指适用于可进入系统的指定订单的唯一处理方式，包括以下内容：

rule: (2) "Limit Order" is an order to buy or sell an option at a specified price or better. A marketable limit order is a limit order to buy (sell) at or above (below) the best offer (bid) on the Exchange.
rule_cn: （2）“限价指令”是指以指定价格或更优价格买入或卖出期权的指令。可成交的限价指令是指以等于或高于（买入）或等于或低于（卖出）交易所当前最优卖价（买价）的价格买入或卖出的限价指令。

rule: (3) "Minimum Quantity Order" is anorder that requires that a specified minimum quantity of contracts be obtained, or the order is cancelled. Minimum Quantity Orders are treated as having a time-in-force designation of Immediate or Cancel.
rule_cn: （3）“最小数量订单”是指必须获得指定最小数量合约的订单，或者在未满足最小数量要求时取消该订单。最小数量订单将被视为具有“立即成交或取消”（Immediate or Cancel）的有效时间属性。

rule: Minimum Quantity Orders received prior to the opening cross or after market close will be rejected.
rule_cn: 在市场开盘前或收盘后收到的最低数量订单将被拒绝。
trl:
rule 1
IF Time < 开盘前 OR Time > 收盘后 AND Action = 收到 AND Quantity = 最低数量 THEN Result = 失败
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 时间 < 开盘前 and 操作 = 收到 and 数量 = 最低数量
then 结果 = 失败
rule 2
if 时间 > 收盘后 and 操作 = 收到 and 数量 = 最低数量
then 结果 = 失败

rule: (4) "Market Order" is an order to buy or sell at the best price available at the time of execution. Participants can designate that their Market Orders not executed after a pre-established period of time, as established by the Exchange, will be cancelled back to the Participant, once an option series has opened for trading. Market Orders on the Order Book would be immediately cancelled if an options series halted, provided the Participant designated the cancellation of Market Orders.
rule_cn: （4）“市价指令”是指在成交时以当时可获得的最优价格买入或卖出的指令。参与者可以指定，若在交易所规定的预定时间段内市价指令未能成交，一旦相关期权系列开始交易，该指令将被取消并返还给参与者。如果期权系列暂停交易，且参与者已指定取消市价指令，则订单簿中的市价指令将立即被取消。

rule: (5) "Price Improving Order" is anorder to buy or sell an option at a specified price at an increment smaller than the minimum price variation in the security. Price Improving Orders may be entered in increments as small as one cent. Price Improving Orders that are available for display shall be displayed at the minimum price variation in that security and shall be rounded up for sell orders and rounded down for buy orders.
rule_cn: （5）“改进价指令”是指以比该证券最小价格变动单位更小的幅度，在指定价格买入或卖出期权的指令。改进价指令可以以最小至一分钱的幅度进行申报。对于可显示的改进价指令，应以该证券的最小价格变动单位进行显示，卖出指令应向上取整，买入指令应向下取整。

rule: (6) "On the Open Order" is an order with a designated time-in-force of "OPG". An On the Open Order will be executable only during the Opening Cross. If such order is not executed in its entirety during the Opening Cross, the order, or any unexecuted portion of such order, will be cancelled back to the entering participant.
rule_cn: （6）“开市时成交”指令是一种指定有效时间（Time-in-Force）为“OPG”的指令。只有在开市撮合期间，“开市时成交”指令才可执行。如果该指令在开市撮合期间未被全部成交，该指令或其未成交部分将被撤销并返还给委托方参与者。

rule: (7) "Intermarket Sweep Order" or "ISO" is a Limit Order that meets the requirements of Options 5, Section 1(8). Orders submitted to the Exchange as ISO are not routable and will ignore the ABBO and trade at allowable prices on the Exchange.
rule_cn: （7）“跨市场扫单”或“ISO”是一种限价订单，符合第5项第1（8）款的要求。提交至交易所的ISO订单不可路由，将忽略ABBO（自动最佳报价订单），并在交易所内以允许的价格成交。
trl:
rule 1
IF (Action = 跨市场扫单 OR Action = ISO) AND TradingMethod = 限价订单 AND Constraint = 符合第5项第1(8)款的要求 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF (Action = 跨市场扫单 OR Action = ISO) AND Action = 提交 AND TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Constraint = 不可路由 AND Constraint = 忽略ABBO AND Price = 允许的价格 AND Status = 成交 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 符合第5项第18款的要求 and 操作 = 跨市场扫单 and 交易方式 = 限价订单
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 = 符合第5项第18款的要求 and 操作 = ISO and 交易方式 = 限价订单
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 不可路由 and 约束 = 忽略ABBO and 操作 = 跨市场扫单 and 操作 = 提交 and 价格 = 允许的价格 and 状态 = 成交
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 交易市场 = 交易所 and 约束 = 不可路由 and 约束 = 忽略ABBO and 操作 = ISO and 操作 = 提交 and 价格 = 允许的价格 and 状态 = 成交
then 结果 = 成功

rule: ISOs may be entered on the Order Book. ISOs may have any time-in-force designation and are handled within the System pursuant to Options 3, Section 10 and shall not be eligible for routing as set out in Options 5, Section 4. ISO Orders may not be submitted during the opening.
rule_cn: ISO订单可以在订单簿中输入。ISO订单可以具有任何有效时间指定，并根据第10节第3项的规定在系统内进行处理，且不得按照第4节第5项所述方式进行路由。在开盘期间不得提交ISO订单。

rule: (A) Simultaneously with the routing of an ISO to the System, one or more additional limit orders, as necessary, are routed by the entering party to execute against the full displayed size of any protected bid or offer (as defined in Options 5, Section 1) in the case of a limit order to sell or buy with a price that is superior to the limit price of the limit order identified as an intermarket sweep order (as defined in Options 5, Section 1). These additional routed orders must be identified as ISOs.
rule_cn: （A）在将一个ISO（做市商订单）路由至系统的同时，如有必要，输入方还需将一个或多个额外的限价订单路由至系统，以执行任何受保护的买盘或卖盘（如第5选项第1节中定义）的全部显示数量。该情况适用于以优于该限价订单所识别的跨市场扫单订单（如第5选项第1节中定义）的限价的价格下达的卖出或买入限价订单。这些额外路由的订单必须被标识为ISO。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 路由 AND OperationPart = ISO AND OperationPart = 系统 AND Constraint = 如有必要 AND Actor = 输入方 AND Action = 路由 AND (Quantity = 一个 OR Quantity = 多个) AND TradingMethod = 限价订单 AND OperationPart = 系统 AND Action = 执行 AND (OperationPart = 受保护的买盘 OR OperationPart = 受保护的卖盘) AND Quantity = 全部显示数量 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF TradingMethod = 限价订单 AND (TradingDirection = 卖出 OR TradingDirection = 买入) AND Price > 跨市场扫单订单限价 AND OperationPart = 跨市场扫单订单 THEN Result = 适用

rule 3
IF Action = 路由 AND TradingMethod = 限价订单 AND Constraint = 额外 AND Status = 标识 AND Status = ISO THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 输入方 and 约束 = 如有必要 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 执行 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 数量 = 一个 and 数量 = 全部显示数量 and 操作部分 = ISO and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 受保护的买盘
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 输入方 and 约束 = 如有必要 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 执行 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 数量 = 多个 and 数量 = 全部显示数量 and 操作部分 = ISO and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 受保护的买盘
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 输入方 and 约束 = 如有必要 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 路由 and 操作 = 执行 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 数量 = 多个 and 数量 = 全部显示数量 and 操作部分 = ISO and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 系统 and 操作部分 = 受保护的卖盘
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 交易方向 = 卖出 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 价格 > 跨市场扫单订单限价 and 操作部分 = 跨市场扫单订单
then 结果 = 适用
rule 5
if 交易方向 = 买入 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 价格 > 跨市场扫单订单限价 and 操作部分 = 跨市场扫单订单
then 结果 = 适用
rule 6
if 约束 = 额外 and 操作 = 路由 and 交易方式 = 限价订单 and 状态 = 标识 and 状态 = ISO
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (8) "All-or-None Order" is a Market or Limit Order which is to be executed in its entirety or not at all. All-or-None Orders are treated as having a time-in-force designation of Immediate or Cancel. All-or-None Orders received prior to the opening cross or after market close will be rejected.
rule_cn: （8）“全或无订单”是一种市价单或限价单，该订单必须全部成交或完全不成交。全或无订单的时效性设定为“立即成交或取消”。在市场开市前或收市后提交的全或无订单将被拒绝。

rule: (9) "Add Liquidity Order" is an order that will not remove liquidity from the System. Add Liquidity Orders are to be ranked and executed on the Exchange or cancelled, as appropriate, without routing away to another market. Add Liquidity Orders are evaluated at the time of entry with respect to locking or crossing other orders as follows: (i) if an Add Liquidity Order would lock or cross an order on the System, the order will be re-priced to $.01 below the current low offer (for bids) or above the current best bid (for offers) and displayed by the System at one minimum price increment below the current low offer (for bids) or above the current best bid (for offers); and (ii) if a Add Liquidity Order would not lock or cross an order on the System but would lock or cross the NBBO as reflected in the protected quotation of another market center, the order will be handled pursuant to Options 3, Section 5(b) – (d). Participants may choose to have their Add Liquidity Orders returned whenever the order would lock or cross the NBBO or be placed on the order book at a price other than its limit price. Add Liquidity Orders received prior to the Opening Process will be eligible for execution during the Opening Processand will be processed as per Options 3, Section 8. Add Liquidity Orders received after market close will be rejected. Add Liquidity Orders may not have a time-in-force designation of Good Til Cancelled or Immediate or Cancel.
rule_cn: （9）“增加流动性订单”是指不会从系统中移除流动性的订单。增加流动性订单应根据情况在交易所内进行排序并执行，或予以取消，而不应路由至其他市场。在订单进入系统时，会根据其是否会锁定或交叉其他订单进行评估，具体如下：（i）如果增加流动性订单会锁定或交叉系统中的其他订单，该订单将被重新定价为当前最低卖价以下0.01美元（对于买价订单）或当前最佳买价以上（对于卖价订单），并在系统中以当前最低卖价以下一个最小价格单位（对于买价订单）或当前最佳买价以上（对于卖价订单）显示；（ii）如果增加流动性订单不会锁定或交叉系统中的订单，但会锁定或交叉其他市场中心保护报价所反映的全国最佳报价（NBBO），则该订单将按照第5（b）至（d）款的选项3进行处理。参与者可以选择在订单锁定或交叉NBBO，或以不同于其限价的价格挂单时，将增加流动性订单返回。在开盘流程开始前收到的增加流动性订单，将在开盘流程中获得执行资格，并按照第8款进行处理。在市场收盘后收到的增加流动性订单将被拒绝。增加流动性订单不得指定为“有效至取消”或“立即成交或取消”。

rule: (b) The term "Time in Force" or "TIF" shall mean the period of time that the System will hold an order for potential execution, and shall include:
rule_cn: (b) “有效时间”或“TIF”一词的含义是指系统将保留订单以待执行的时间段，包括以下内容：

rule: (1) "On the Open Order" or "OPG" shall mean for orders so designated, that if after entry into the System, the order is not fully executed in its entirety during the Opening Cross, the order, or any unexecuted portion of such order, will be cancelled back to the entering participant. OPG orders may not route. This order type is not subject to any protections listed in Options 3, Section 15, except Size Limitation.
rule_cn: （1）“开市盘口订单”或“OPG”是指，对于被标记为此类订单的订单，如果在进入系统后，该订单在开市撮合期间未能全部成交，该订单或其未成交部分将被取消并退回至下单参与者。OPG订单不得路由。此类订单类型不受第15节选项3中列出的任何保护措施的约束，但除外“数量限制”。

rule: (2) "Immediate-Or-Cancel" or "IOC" is a Market Order or Limit Order to be executed in whole or in part upon receipt. Any portion not so executed is cancelled and/or routed pursuant to Participant's instruction. IOC orders may be entered through FIX, or SQF, provided that an IOC Order entered by a Market Maker through SQF is not subject to the Order Price Protection, the Market Order Spread Protection, or Size Limitation in Options 3, Section 15(a)(1), (a)(2), and (b)(2), respectively. IOC Orders entered through SQF may not route.
rule_cn: （2）“立即成交或取消”（Immediate-Or-Cancel，简称IOC）是一种市价订单或限价订单，该订单在收到后必须全部或部分立即成交。未成交的部分将根据参与者（Participant）的指令进行取消和/或路由。IOC订单可通过FIX或SQF方式输入，但通过SQF方式输入的IOC订单，不适用于第3选项第15（a）（1）、（a）（2）和（b）（2）项中规定的订单价格保护、市价订单价差保护及交易规模限制。通过SQF方式输入的IOC订单不得进行路由。

rule: (3) "DAY" is an order entered with a TIF of “Day” that expires at the end of the day on which it was entered, if not executed.
rule_cn: （3）“当日”是指以“当日”（TIF）方式下达的订单，若未成交，则在下达订单的当天收盘时失效。

rule: All orders by their terms are Day Orders unless otherwise specified. Day orders may be entered through FIX.
rule_cn: 除非另有规定，所有订单均为当日有效订单。当日有效订单可通过FIX协议进行输入。
trl:
rule 1
IF Constraint = 除非另有规定 AND Status = 所有订单 THEN Result = 当日有效订单

rule 2
IF Status = 当日有效订单 AND Action = 输入 AND TradingMethod = FIX协议 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 除非另有规定 and 状态 = 所有订单
then 结果 = 当日有效订单
rule 2
if 操作 = 输入 and 交易方式 = FIX协议 and 状态 = 当日有效订单
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (4) "Good Til Cancelled" or "GTC" is an order entered with a TIF of “GTC” that, if not fully executed, will remain available for potential display and/or execution unless cancelled by the entering party, or until the option expires, whichever comes first.
rule_cn: （4）“有效至取消”或“GTC”是指以“GTC”作为成交条件（TIF）下达的订单，如果该订单未被完全成交，则将继续有效，可供潜在展示和/或成交，除非由下达该订单的一方取消，或期权到期，以先发生者为准。

rule: GTC Orders shall be available for entry from the time prior to market open specified by the Exchange until market close. GTC Orders may only be entered through FIX.
rule_cn: GTC订单可在交易所规定的市场开市前时段至市场闭市期间随时录入。GTC订单只能通过FIX协议录入。

rule: (c) Routing Strategies. Orders may be entered on the Exchange with a routing strategy of SEEK, SRCH or Do-Not-Route (“DNR”) as provided in Options 5, Section 4 through FIX only.
rule_cn: (c) 路由策略。订单可通过交易所以 SEEK、SRCH 或不路由（“DNR”）的路由策略进行发送，仅限于第 4 节选项 5 中规定的通过 FIX 协议发送。
trl:
rule 1
IF Action = 发送 AND OperationPart = 订单 AND Constraint = 路由策略 AND (Constraint = SEEK OR Constraint = SRCH OR Constraint = DNR) AND Constraint = 通过 FIX 协议发送 AND Constraint = 第 4 节选项 5 中规定 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 路由策略 and 约束 = SEEK and 操作 = 发送 and 操作部分 = 订单 and 通过FIX协议发送 and 第4节选项5中规定
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 = 路由策略 and 约束 = SRCH and 操作 = 发送 and 操作部分 = 订单 and 通过FIX协议发送 and 第4节选项5中规定
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 约束 = 路由策略 and 约束 = DNR and 操作 = 发送 and 操作部分 = 订单 and 通过FIX协议发送 and 第4节选项5中规定
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (d) The term "Order Size" shall mean the number of contracts up to 999,999 associated with the Order.
rule_cn: (d) “订单数量”指与该订单相关的合同数量，最多为999,999份。

rule: (e) Entry and Display of Orders and Quotes. Participants may enter orders and quotes into the System as specified below.
rule_cn: (e) 订单与报价的录入与显示。参与者可根据以下规定将订单和报价录入系统。

rule: (1) The Exchange offers Participants the following protocols for entering orders and quotes respectively:
rule_cn: （1）交易所为参与者提供以下订单和报价的协议：

rule: (A) "Financial Information eXchange" or "FIX" is an interface that allows Participants and their Sponsored Customers to connect, send, and receive messages related to orders to and from the Exchange. Features include the following: (1) execution messages; (2) order messages; and (3) risk protection triggers and cancel notifications.
rule_cn: （A）“金融信息交换”或“FIX”是一种接口，允许参与者及其赞助客户与交易所连接，发送和接收与订单相关的消息。其功能包括以下内容：（1）成交消息；（2）订单消息；以及（3）风险保护触发器和取消通知。

rule: (B) "Specialized Quote Feed" or "SQF" is an interface that allows Market Makers to connect, send, and receive messages related to quotes and Immediate-or- Cancel Orders into and from the Exchange. Features include the following: (1) options symbol directory messages (e.g., underlying instruments); (2) system event messages (e.g., start of trading hours messages and start of opening); (3) trading action messages (e.g., halts and resumes); (4) execution messages; (5) quote messages; (6) Immediate-or-Cancel Order messages; (7) risk protection triggers and purge notifications; and (8) opening imbalance messages. The SQF Purge Interface only receives and notifies of purge requests from the Market Maker. Market Makers may only enter interest into SQF in their assigned options series. Immediate-or-Cancel Orders entered into SQF are not subject to the Order Price Protection, Market Order Spread Protection, or Size Limitation in Options 3, Section 15(a)(1) and (a)(2), and (b)(2), respectively.
rule_cn: （B）“专用报价行情接口”或“SQF”是一个接口，允许做市商连接至交易所，并发送和接收与报价和即时成交或取消订单相关的消息。其功能包括以下内容：（1）期权标的物目录消息（例如，基础资产）；（2）系统事件消息（例如，交易时间开始消息和开盘开始）；（3）交易操作消息（例如，暂停和恢复交易）；（4）成交消息；（5）报价消息；（6）即时成交或取消订单消息；（7）风险保护触发消息和清除通知；（8）开盘不平衡消息。SQF清除接口仅接收并通知做市商发出的清除请求。做市商只能在其分配的期权系列中参与SQF。在SQF中输入的即时成交或取消订单不适用于《期权规则》第3章第15(a)(1)和(a)(2)条以及(b)(2)条中的订单价格保护、市价订单价差保护或数量限制。

rule: (C) Reserved.
rule_cn: （C）保留。

rule: (D) "Quote Using Orders" or "QUO" is an interface that allows Market Makers to connect, send, and receive messages related to single-sided orders to and from the Exchange. Order Features include the following: (1) options symbol directory messages (e.g., underlying); (2) system event messages (e.g., start of trading hours messages and start of opening); (3) trading action messages (e.g., halts and resumes); (4) execution messages; (5) order messages; and (6) risk protection triggers and cancel notifications. Orders submitted by Market Makers over this interface are treated as quotes. Market Makers may only enter interest into QUO in their assigned options series. Orders entered into QUO are not subject to the Order Price Protection or Size Limitation in Options 3, Section 15(a)(1) and (b)(2), respectively.
rule_cn: （D）“报价使用订单”或“QUO”是一个接口，允许做市商与交易所之间发送和接收与单边订单相关的消息。订单功能包括以下内容：（1）期权符号目录消息（例如，标的资产）；（2）系统事件消息（例如，交易时段开始消息和开市开始）；（3）交易操作消息（例如，暂停和恢复交易）；（4）成交消息；（5）订单消息；以及（6）风险保护触发器和取消通知。通过该接口提交的订单将被视为报价。做市商只能在其分配的期权系列中参与QUO。通过QUO提交的订单不受《期权规则》第3条第15(a)(1)款和第15(b)(2)款中关于订单价格保护和订单规模限制的约束。

rule: Section 8. Opening and Halt Cross
rule_cn: 第8节 开启与停止横跨

rule: (a) Definitions. For the purposes of this Rule the term:
rule_cn: （a）定义。为本规则之目的，以下术语的含义如下：

rule: (1) "Imbalance" shall mean the number of contracts of Eligible Interest that may not be matched with other order contracts at a particular price at any given time.
rule_cn: （1）“不平衡”指在某一特定价格下，某一可交易利息合约无法与其他订单合约匹配的数量。

rule: (2) "Order Imbalance Indicator" shall mean a message disseminated by electronic means containing information about Eligible Interest and the price in penny increments at which such interest would execute at the time of dissemination. The Order Imbalance Indicator shall disseminate the following information: (A) "Current Reference Price" shall mean an indication of what the opening cross price would be at a particular point in time. (B) the number of contracts of Eligible Interest that are paired at the Current Reference Price; (C) the size of any Imbalance; and (D) the buy/sell direction of any Imbalance.
rule_cn: （2）“订单失衡指标”指通过电子方式传播的信息，包含有关合格利息及其在传播时点以美分增量价格执行的利率信息。订单失衡指标应传播以下信息：（A）“当前参考价格”指某一特定时间点的开市交叉价格的指示；（B）在当前参考价格下配对的合格利息合约数量；（C）任何失衡的规模；以及（D）任何失衡的买方或卖方方向。

rule: (3) "Nasdaq Opening Cross" shall mean the process for opening or resuming trading pursuant to this Rule and shall include the process for determining the price at which Eligible Interest shall be executed at the open of trading for the day, or the open of trading for a halted option, and the process for executing that Eligible Interest.
rule_cn: （3）“纳斯达克开盘交叉”是指根据本规则进行开盘或恢复交易的程序，包括确定当日交易开市时或暂停交易期权开市时，合格申报应以何种价格成交的程序，以及执行该合格申报的程序。

rule: (4) "Eligible Interest" shall mean any quotation or any order that may be entered into the system and designated with a time- in-force of IOC (immediate-or-cancel), DAY (day order), GTC (good-till-cancelled), and OPG (On the Open Order). However, orders received via FIX protocol prior to the Nasdaq Opening Cross designated with a time-in-force of IOC will be rejected and shall not be considered eligible interest. Orders received via QUO and quotes received via SQF prior to the Nasdaq Opening Cross designated with a time-in-force of IOC will remain in-force through the opening and shall be cancelled immediately after the opening.
rule_cn: （4）“合格申报”指任何可能进入系统并标注有即时成交剩余撤单（IOC）、当日有效（DAY）、直到取消（GTC）或开市时有效（OPG）有效时间的报价或订单。然而，通过FIX协议在纳斯达克开市撮合前收到的、标注有IOC有效时间的订单将被拒绝，不视为合格申报。通过QUO方式收到的订单以及通过SQF方式收到的报价，若在纳斯达克开市撮合前标注有IOC有效时间，则其有效时间将延续至开市，并在开市后立即取消。

rule: (5) "Market for the Underlying Security" shall mean either the primary listing market, the primary volume market (defined as the market with the most liquidity in that underlying security for the previous two calendar months), or the first market to open the underlying security, as determined by the Exchange on an issue-by-issue basis and announced to the membership on the Exchange's web site.
rule_cn: （5）“基础证券的交易市场”指交易所根据每只证券的具体情况确定的以下市场之一：基础证券的主要上市交易市场、主要交易市场（定义为过去两个日历月中该基础证券流动性最强的市场）或基础证券首次开市的市场，并由交易所通过其网站向会员公布。

rule: (6) "Valid Width National Best Bid or Offer" or "Valid Width NBBO" shall mean the combination of all away market quotes and any combination of NOM-registered Market Maker orders and quotes received over the QUO or SQF Protocols within a specified bid/ask differential as established and published by the Exchange. The Valid Width NBBO will be configurable by underlying, and tables with valid width differentials will be posted by Nasdaq on its website. Away markets that are crossed will void all Valid Width NBBO calculations. If any Market Maker orders or quotes on NOM are crossed internally, then all such orders and quotes will be excluded from the Valid Width NBBO calculation.
rule_cn: (6) “有效宽度全国最佳报价或报价”或“有效宽度NBBO”是指在交易所公布并发布的指定买卖价差范围内，所有远离市场报价以及通过QUO或SQF协议接收的任何NOM注册做市商订单和报价的组合。有效宽度NBBO将根据基础资产进行配置，纳斯达克将在其网站上发布有效宽度价差的表格。如果远离市场发生交叉交易，则将取消所有有效宽度NBBO的计算。如果NOM上的任何做市商订单或报价发生内部交叉，则所有此类订单和报价将被排除在有效宽度NBBO的计算之外。

rule: (7) "Away Best Bid or Offer" or "ABBO" shall mean the displayed National Best Bid or Offer not including the Exchange's Best Bid or Offer.
rule_cn: （7）“远离最优买盘或卖盘”或“ABBO”是指不包括交易所最优买盘或卖盘的显示的全国最优买盘或卖盘。

rule: (b) Processing of NOM Opening Cross. For the opening of trading of options series traded on NOM, the Opening Cross shall occur at or after 9:30, if the dissemination of a regular market hours quote or trade (as determined by the Exchange) by the Market for the Underlying Security has occurred (or, in the case of index options, the Exchange has received the opening price of the underlying index). Or, in the case of a trading halt, the Opening Cross shall occur when trading resumes pursuant to Options 3, Section 9. Market hours trading shall commence or, in the case of a halted option, resume when the Nasdaq Opening Cross concludes.
rule_cn: (b) NOM 开盘交叉处理。对于在NOM上市交易的期权系列的开市交易，若市场对标的证券的常规交易时间报价或交易（由交易所确定）已发生（对于指数期权而言，交易所已收到标的指数的开盘价），则开盘交叉应于9:30或之后进行。如发生交易暂停，开盘交叉应在根据第9条第3款恢复交易时进行。当纳斯达克开盘交叉结束时，交易时间将开始，如为暂停交易的期权，则恢复交易。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND TradingInstrument = 期权系列 AND Event = 开市交易 AND ((TradingInstrument = 标的证券 AND Event = 常规交易时间报价或交易已发生) OR (TradingInstrument = 指数期权 AND Event = 交易所已收到标的指数的开盘价)) AND Action = 开盘交叉 AND Time in [09:30-24:00] THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND TradingInstrument = 期权系列 AND Event = 交易暂停 AND Action = 开盘交叉 AND Event = 根据第9条第3款恢复交易 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Event = 纳斯达克开盘交叉结束 AND Action = 开始交易时间 THEN Result = 成功

rule 4
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND TradingInstrument = 期权系列 AND Status = 暂停交易 AND Event = 纳斯达克开盘交叉结束 AND Action = 恢复交易 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 期权系列 and 交易品种 = 标的证券 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 in [09:30-24:00] and 事件 = 开市交易 and 事件 = 常规交易时间报价或交易已发生 and 操作 = 开盘交叉
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 交易品种 = 期权系列 and 交易品种 = 指数期权 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 in [09:30-24:00] and 事件 = 开市交易 and 事件 = 交易所已收到标的指数的开盘价 and 操作 = 开盘交叉
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 交易品种 = 期权系列 and 交易市场 = NOM and 事件 = 交易暂停 and 事件 = 根据第9条第3款恢复交易 and 操作 = 开盘交叉
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 交易市场 = NOM and 事件 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉结束 and 操作 = 开始交易时间
then 结果 = 成功
rule 5
if 交易品种 = 期权系列 and 交易市场 = NOM and 事件 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉结束 and 操作 = 恢复交易 and 状态 = 暂停交易
then 结果 = 成功

rule: In each case, the opening of trading or resumption of trading after a halt of options series will be dependent on the following criteria, provided the ABBO is not crossed:
rule_cn: 在以下条件满足的情况下（前提是ABBO未被突破），期权系列的交易开市或暂停交易后的恢复交易将依据以下标准进行：

rule: (1) If there is a possible trade on NOM, a Valid Width NBBO must be present.
rule_cn: (1) 如果存在可能在NOM上进行交易的情况，必须存在有效的宽度NBBO。

rule: (2) If no trade is possible on NOM, then NOM will open dependent upon one of the following: (A) A Valid Width NBBO is present; (B) A certain number of other options exchanges (as determined by the Exchange) have disseminated a firm quote on OPRA; or (C) A certain period of time (as determined by the Exchange) has elapsed.
rule_cn: (2) 如果在NOM上无法进行交易，则NOM的开盘将依据以下情况之一进行：(A) 存在一个有效的宽度NBBO；(B) 交易所确定的一定数量的其他期权交易所已在OPRA上发布了实报价；或(C) 已经过了交易所确定的一定时间。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Event = 无法进行交易 AND (Constraint = 存在有效的宽度NBBO OR (Event = 其他期权交易所发布实报价 AND OperationPart = OPRA AND Quantity = 交易所确定的数量) OR Time >= 交易所确定的时间) THEN Action = 开盘 AND Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易市场 = NOM and 约束 = 存在有效的宽度NBBO and 事件 = 无法进行交易
then 操作 = 开盘 and 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 交易市场 = NOM and 事件 = 无法进行交易 and 事件 = 其他期权交易所发布实报价 and 数量 = 交易所确定的数量 and 操作部分 = OPRA
then 操作 = 开盘 and 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 >= 交易所确定的时间 and 事件 = 无法进行交易
then 操作 = 开盘 and 结果 = 成功

rule: (3) Nasdaq shall disseminate by electronic means an Order Imbalance Indicator every 5 seconds beginning between 9:20 and 9:28, or a shorter dissemination interval as established by the Exchange, with the default being set at 9:25 a.m. The start of dissemination, and a dissemination interval, shall be posted by Nasdaq on its website.
rule_cn: （3）纳斯达克交易所应通过电子方式每5秒发布一次订单不平衡指标，发布时间区间为上午9:20至9:28之间，或交易所规定的更短发布间隔，若未作特别规定，默认发布时间为上午9:25。纳斯达克交易所应在其网站上公布指标发布的开始时间和发布间隔。

rule: (A) The Nasdaq Opening Cross shall occur at the price that maximizes the number of contracts of Eligible Interest in NOM to be executed at or within the ABBO and within a defined range, as established and published by the Exchange, of the Valid Width NBBO.
rule_cn: （A）纳斯达克开盘交叉交易应以在交易所公布的有效宽度NBBO范围内、且在ABBO内或紧邻ABBO的价格进行，该价格能够使符合资格的利息在NOM中执行的合约数量达到最大。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = 纳斯达克 AND Event = 开盘交叉交易 AND Price in NBBO有效宽度范围 AND (Price in ABBO OR Price 紧邻 ABBO) AND Constraint = 使符合资格的利息在NOM中执行的合约数量达到最大 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易市场 = 纳斯达克 and 约束 = 使符合资格的利息在NOM中执行的合约数量达到最大 and 事件 = 开盘交叉交易 and 价格 in NBBO有效宽度范围 and 价格 in ABBO
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 交易市场 = 纳斯达克 and 约束 = 使符合资格的利息在NOM中执行的合约数量达到最大 and 事件 = 开盘交叉交易 and 价格 in NBBO有效宽度范围 and 价格 紧邻 ABBO
then 结果 = 成功

testcase.事件: 开盘交叉交易

rule: (B) If more than one price exists under subparagraph (A), and there are no contracts that would remain unexecuted in the cross, the Nasdaq Opening Cross shall occur at the midpoint price, rounded to the penny closest to the price of the last execution in that series (and in the absence of a previous execution price, the price will round up, if necessary) of (1) the National Best Bid or the last offer on NOM against which contracts will be traded whichever is higher, and (2) the National Best Offer or the last bid on NOM against which contracts will be traded whichever is lower.
rule_cn: （B）如果在（A）款下存在多个价格，并且在交叉交易中没有未执行的合约，则纳斯达克开盘交叉交易将在以下两个价格的中间价进行，四舍五入到最接近上一次成交价格的分（如果不存在先前成交价格，则向上取整）：（1）在将要进行交易的合约所针对的NOM交易对手方的全国最佳买价或最后卖价中，取较高的价格；（2）在将要进行交易的合约所针对的NOM交易对手方的全国最佳卖价或最后买价中，取较低的价格。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = 纳斯达克开盘交叉交易 AND Constraint = 在A款下存在多个价格 AND Status = 没有未执行的合约 AND OperationPart = NOM交易对手方 AND Price = 全国最佳买价 OR Price = 最后卖价 AND Price = 较高 AND OperationPart = NOM交易对手方 AND Price = 全国最佳卖价 OR Price = 最后买价 AND Price = 较低 AND Constraint = 中间价 AND Constraint = 四舍五入到最接近上一次成交价格的分 AND (Event = 不存在先前成交价格 AND Constraint = 向上取整) THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 约束 = 在A款下存在多个价格 and 约束 = 中间价 and 约束 = 四舍五入到最接近上一次成交价格的分 and 约束 = 向上取整 and 事件 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉交易 and 事件 = 不存在先前成交价格 and 价格 = 全国最佳买价 and 价格 = 较高 and 价格 = 全国最佳卖价 and 价格 = 较低 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 状态 = 没有未执行的合约
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 = 在A款下存在多个价格 and 约束 = 中间价 and 约束 = 四舍五入到最接近上一次成交价格的分 and 约束 = 向上取整 and 事件 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉交易 and 事件 = 不存在先前成交价格 and 价格 = 最后卖价 and 价格 = 较高 and 价格 = 全国最佳卖价 and 价格 = 较低 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 状态 = 没有未执行的合约
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 约束 = 在A款下存在多个价格 and 约束 = 中间价 and 约束 = 四舍五入到最接近上一次成交价格的分 and 约束 = 向上取整 and 事件 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉交易 and 事件 = 不存在先前成交价格 and 价格 = 最后卖价 and 价格 = 较高 and 价格 = 最后买价 and 价格 = 较低 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 操作部分 = NOM交易对手方 and 状态 = 没有未执行的合约
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (C) If more than one price exists under subparagraph (A), and contracts would remain unexecuted in the cross, then the opening price will be the highest/lowest price, in the case of a buy/sell imbalance, at which the maximum number of contracts can trade which is equal to or within a defined range, as established and published by the Exchange, of the Valid Width NBBO on the contra side of the imbalance that would not trade through the ABBO.
rule_cn: （C）如果第（A）款下存在多个价格，且在交叉交易中合同无法成交，则开盘价应为在买方或卖方失衡情况下，能够成交的最大合同数量（该数量等于或处于交易所规定并公布的有效宽度NBBO的对冲侧价格范围内，且无法通过ABBO成交的价格）中的最高价或最低价。
trl:
rule 1
IF Constraint = 第A款下存在多个价格 AND Event = 交叉交易中合同无法成交 AND Action = 确定开盘价 AND Constraint = 买方或卖方失衡 AND Quantity = 能够成交的最大合同数量 AND Constraint = 数量等于或处于交易所规定并公布的有效宽度NBBO的对冲侧价格范围内 AND Constraint = 无法通过ABBO成交 AND (Price = 最高价 OR Price = 最低价) THEN Result = 成功

then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 约束 = 第A款下存在多个价格 and 约束 = 买方或卖方失衡 and 约束 = 数量等于或处于交易所规定并公布的有效宽度NBBO的对冲侧价格范围内 and 约束 = 无法通过ABBO成交 and 事件 = 交叉交易中合同无法成交 and 操作 = 确定开盘价 and 数量 = 能够成交的最大合同数量 and 价格 = 最低价
then 结果 = 成功

rule: Regarding unexecuted contracts:
rule_cn: 关于未执行的合同：

rule: (i) If unexecuted contracts remain with a limit price that is equal to the opening price, then the remaining unexecuted contracts will be posted at the opening price, displayed one minimum price variation (MPV) away if displaying at the opening price would lock or cross the ABBO, with the contra-side NOM BBO reflected as firm; (ii) If unexecuted contracts remain with a limit price that is through the opening price, and there is a contra side ABBO at the opening price, then the remaining unexecuted contracts will be posted at the opening price, displayed one minimum price variation (MPV) away, with the contra side NOM BBO reflected as firm and order handling of any remaining interest will be done in accordance with the routing and time-in-force instructions of such interest with the opening price representing the reference price set forth in Options 3, Section 10; (iii) If unexecuted contracts remain with a limit price that is through the opening price, and there is no contra side ABBO at the opening price, then the remaining contracts will be posted at the opening price, with the contra-side NOM BBO reflected as non-firm; and (iv) Order handling of any residual unexecuted contracts will be done in accordance with Options 3, Section 8(b)(7), with the opening price representing the reference price.
rule_cn:
(i) 如果未成交合约的限价等于开盘价，那么剩余的未成交合约将按开盘价挂出。如果在开盘价挂出会导致与ABBO（最佳买卖报价）交叉或锁定，则这些合约将显示在距离开盘价一个最小价格变动单位（MPV）的位置，且与ABBO相对的一方的NOM BBO（名义最佳买卖报价）将被视为有效；

(ii) 如果未成交合约的限价高于或等于开盘价，并且在开盘价处存在与ABBO相对的一方，则剩余的未成交合约将按开盘价挂出，显示在距离开盘价一个最小价格变动单位（MPV）的位置，与ABBO相对的一方的NOM BBO将被视为有效，任何剩余的未成交合约将按照其指令中的路由和有效期规则进行处理，且开盘价将作为第3项第10条中规定的参考价格；

(iii) 如果未成交合约的限价高于或等于开盘价，但开盘价处没有与ABBO相对的一方，则剩余的未成交合约将按开盘价挂出，与ABBO相对的一方的NOM BBO将被视为非有效；

(iv) 任何剩余未成交合约的处理将按照第3项第8(b)(7)条进行，且开盘价将作为参考价格。
trl:
rule 1
IF Status = 未成交合约 AND Price = 限价 AND 限价 = 开盘价 THEN Action = 挂出 AND Price = 开盘价

rule 2
IF Status = 未成交合约 AND Price = 限价 AND 限价 = 开盘价 AND Action = 挂出 AND Price = 开盘价 AND Event = 与ABBO交叉或锁定 THEN Price = 距离开盘价一个MPV AND OperationPart = 与ABBO相对的一方 AND Status = NOM BBO AND ResultStatus = 有效

rule 3
IF Status = 未成交合约 AND Price = 限价 AND (限价 >= 开盘价) AND OperationPart = 与ABBO相对的一方 AND Price = 开盘价 THEN Action = 挂出 AND Price = 距离开盘价一个MPV AND OperationPart = 与ABBO相对的一方 AND Status = NOM BBO AND ResultStatus = 有效 AND Constraint = 按照路由和有效期规则处理 AND Price = 参考价格

rule 4
IF Status = 未成交合约 AND Price = 限价 AND (限价 >= 开盘价) AND OperationPart = 与ABBO相对的一方 AND Price = 开盘价 AND OperationPart = 不存在 THEN Action = 挂出 AND Price = 开盘价 AND OperationPart = 与ABBO相对的一方 AND Status = NOM BBO AND ResultStatus = 非有效

rule 5
IF Status = 剩余未成交合约 THEN Action = 处理 AND Constraint = 按照第3项第8(b)(7)条 AND Price = 参考价格
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 价格 = 限价 and 状态 = 未成交合约 and 限价 = 开盘价
then 操作 = 挂出 and 价格 = 开盘价
rule 2
if 事件 = 与ABBO交叉或锁定 and 操作 = 挂出 and 价格 = 限价 and 价格 = 开盘价 and 状态 = 未成交合约 and 限价 = 开盘价
then 价格 = 距离开盘价一个MPV and 操作部分 = 与ABBO相对的一方 and 状态 = NOM BBO and 结果状态 = 有效
rule 3
if 价格 = 限价 and 价格 = 开盘价 and 操作部分 = 与ABBO相对的一方 and 状态 = 未成交合约 and 限价 >= 开盘价
then 约束 = 按照路由和有效期规则处理 and 操作 = 挂出 and 价格 = 距离开盘价一个MPV and 价格 = 参考价格 and 操作部分 = 与ABBO相对的一方 and 状态 = NOM BBO and 结果状态 = 有效
rule 4
if 价格 = 限价 and 价格 = 开盘价 and 操作部分 = 与ABBO相对的一方 and 操作部分 = 不存在 and 状态 = 未成交合约 and 限价 >= 开盘价
then 操作 = 挂出 and 价格 = 开盘价 and 操作部分 = 与ABBO相对的一方 and 状态 = NOM BBO and 结果状态 = 非有效
rule 5
if 状态 = 剩余未成交合约
then 约束 = 按照第3项第8b7条 and 操作 = 处理 and 价格 = 参考价格

rule: (5) If the Nasdaq Opening Cross price is selected and fewer than all contracts of Eligible Interest that are available in NOM would be executed, all Eligible Interest shall be executed at the Nasdaq Opening Cross price in accordance with the execution algorithm assigned to the associated underlying option.
rule_cn: （5）如果选择了纳斯达克开盘交叉价，并且在NOM中可交易的合格合约数量少于所有可用的合格合约，则所有合格合约应按照与相关基础期权关联的执行算法，以纳斯达克开盘交叉价进行交易。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = 选择了纳斯达克开盘交叉价 AND Quantity = 在NOM中可交易的合格合约 AND Quantity < Quantity = 所有可用的合格合约 AND TradingInstrument = 所有合格合约 AND Price = 纳斯达克开盘交叉价 AND TradingMethod = 执行算法 AND Constraint = 与相关基础期权关联 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 交易品种 = 所有合格合约 and 约束 = 与相关基础期权关联 and 事件 = 选择了纳斯达克开盘交叉价 and 交易方式 = 执行算法 and 数量 = 在NOM中可交易的合格合约 and 数量 < 数量 = 所有可用的合格合约 and 价格 = 纳斯达克开盘交叉价
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (6) All Eligible Interest executed in the Nasdaq Opening Cross shall be executed at the Nasdaq Opening Cross price, and disseminated via a national market system plan. The Nasdaq Opening Cross price shall be the Nasdaq Official Opening Price for options that participate in the Nasdaq Opening Cross.
rule_cn: （6）在纳斯达克开盘撮合中执行的所有合格申报，均应以纳斯达克开盘撮合价进行成交，并通过全国市场系统计划进行发布。参与纳斯达克开盘撮合的期权，其纳斯达克开盘撮合价即为纳斯达克官方开盘价。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = 纳斯达克 AND Event = 开盘撮合 AND Status = 执行 AND Constraint = 合格申报 THEN Price = 纳斯达克开盘撮合价 AND ResultStatus = 已成交 AND Action = 发布 AND OperationPart = 全国市场系统计划

rule 2
IF TradingInstrument = 期权 AND Event = 参与纳斯达克开盘撮合 THEN Price = 纳斯达克开盘撮合价 AND Price = 纳斯达克官方开盘价

rule 1
if 交易市场 = 纳斯达克 and 约束 = 合格申报 and 事件 = 开盘撮合 and 状态 = 执行
then 操作 = 发布 and 价格 = 纳斯达克开盘撮合价 and 操作部分 = 全国市场系统计划 and 结果状态 = 已成交
rule 2
if 交易品种 = 期权 and 事件 = 参与纳斯达克开盘撮合
then 价格 = 纳斯达克开盘撮合价 and 价格 = 纳斯达克官方开盘价

rule: (7) If the conditions specified in (b) above have occurred, but there is an imbalance containing marketable routable interest, then one additional Order Imbalance Indicator will be disseminated, after which the cross will occur, executing the maximum number of contracts at the price provided for in subsection (b)(4) of this Rule. Any remaining Imbalance will be canceled, posted, or routed as per the directions on the customer's order.
rule_cn: （7）如果上述（b）项中规定的条件已经发生，但存在包含可交易可路由利益的失衡情况，则将发布一个额外的订单失衡指标，之后将进行交叉交易，以（b）（4）项中规定的价位执行尽可能多的合约。任何剩余的失衡部分将根据客户订单中的指示予以取消、发布或路由。

rule: (c) Absence of Opening Cross. If an Opening Cross in a symbol is not initiated before the conclusion of the Opening Order Cancel Timer, a firm may elect to have orders returned by providing written notification to the Exchange. These orders include all non GTC orders received over the FIX protocol. The Opening Order Cancel Timer represents a period of time since the underlying market has opened, and shall be established and disseminated by Nasdaq on its website.
rule_cn: (c) 未成交申报未被触发。如果在基础市场开盘后，未在开盘申报取消计时器结束前触发开盘申报，则交易所可以决定通过书面通知交易所的方式将订单退回。这些订单包括通过FIX协议接收的所有非“当日有效”（GTC）订单。开盘申报取消计时器表示自基础市场开盘以来经过的时间，该计时器由纳斯达克在其网站上设定并公布。

rule: Section 9. Trading Halts
rule_cn: 第九节 交易暂停

rule: (a) Halts. Nasdaq Regulation may halt trading in any option contract in the interests of a fair and orderly market. The following are among the factors that shall be considered in determining whether the trading in an option contract should be halted:
rule_cn: (a) 停市。纳斯达克交易规则可能为了维护一个公平有序的市场而暂停任何期权合约的交易。在决定是否暂停某项期权合约的交易时，应考虑以下因素：

rule: (1) trading in the underlying security has been halted or suspended in the primary market.
rule_cn: （1）基础证券在主要市场交易已被暂停或停止。

rule: (2) the opening of such underlying security has been delayed because of unusual circumstances.
rule_cn: （2）此类基础证券的上市因特殊情况而被延迟。

rule: (3) occurrence of an act of God or other event outside NOM's control;
rule_cn: （3）发生不可抗力或其他超出NOM控制的事件；

rule: (4) a Trading System technical failure or failures including, but not limited to, the failure of a part of the central processing system, a number of Options Participant trading applications, or the electrical power supply to the system itself or any related system; or;
rule_cn: （4）交易系统技术故障，包括但不限于中央处理系统部分出现故障、多个期权参与者交易应用程序出现故障，或系统本身或任何相关系统的供电中断；或；

rule: (5) other unusual conditions or circumstances are present.
rule_cn: （5）存在其他异常情况或条件。

rule: (6) Trading Pauses. Trading on the Exchange in any option contract shall be halted whenever trading in the underlying security has been paused by the primary listing market.
rule_cn: （6）交易暂停。如果基础证券的主要上市市场暂停了交易，则在交易所中相关期权合约的交易也将暂停。

rule: (A) Trading in such options contracts may be resumed upon a determination by the Exchange that the conditions that led to the pause are no longer present and that the interests of a fair and orderly market are best served by a resumption of trading, which in no circumstances will be before the Exchange has received notification that the underlying security has resumed trading on at least one exchange. If, however, trading has not been resumed on the primary listing market for the underlying security after ten minutes have passed since the underlying security was paused by the primary listing market, trading in such options contracts may be resumed by the Exchange if the underlying security has resumed trading on at least one exchange.
rule_cn: （A）交易所可决定在导致暂停交易的条件已不再存在，并且恢复交易有助于维护一个公平、有序的市场的情况下，恢复此类期权合约的交易。此种恢复交易的时间不得早于交易所收到通知，即标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易。然而，如果在标的证券被主要上市市场暂停交易后，经过十分钟仍未在主要上市市场恢复交易，则交易所可在标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易的情况下，恢复此类期权合约的交易。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = 导致暂停交易的条件已不再存在 AND Constraint = 恢复交易有助于维护一个公平有序的市场 AND Action = 恢复 AND OperationPart = 此类期权合约的交易 AND Time >= Time = 交易所收到通知标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF Event = 标的证券被主要上市市场暂停交易 AND Time > Time = 十分钟 AND Status = 未在主要上市市场恢复交易 AND Event = 标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易 AND Action = 恢复 AND OperationPart = 此类期权合约的交易 THEN Result = 成功
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 时间 >= 时间 = 交易所收到通知标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易 and 约束 = 恢复交易有助于维护一个公平有序的市场 and 事件 = 导致暂停交易的条件已不再存在 and 操作 = 恢复 and 操作部分 = 此类期权合约的交易
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 时间 > 时间 = 十分钟 and 事件 = 标的证券被主要上市市场暂停交易 and 事件 = 标的证券已在至少一个交易所恢复交易 and 操作 = 恢复 and 操作部分 = 此类期权合约的交易 and 状态 = 未在主要上市市场恢复交易
then 结果 = 成功
