rule: (c) Obvious Errors.
rule_cn: (c) 显而易见的错误。

rule: (1) Definition. For purposes of this Rule, an Obvious Error will be deemed to have occurred when the Exchange receives a properly submitted filing where the execution price of a transaction is higher or lower than the Theoretical Price for the series by an amount equal to at least the amount shown below: Theoretical Price Minimum Amount Below $2.00
rule_cn: （1）定义。为本规则之目的，当交易所收到一份按规定提交的文件，其中某笔交易的成交价与该系列的理论价相比，偏离幅度达到下列最低金额时，将视为发生了明显错误（Obvious Error）：理论价低于2.00美元的最低金额

rule: (2) Time Deadline. A party that believes that it participated in a transaction that was the result of an Obvious Error must notify the Exchange's Official in the manner specified from time to time by the Exchange in a notice distributed to Participants.
rule_cn: （2）时间期限。如果一方认为其参与了一项因明显错误而产生的交易，该方必须按照交易所不时规定的方式，通过向参与者分发的通知中所指定的方式，通知交易所的官方人员。

rule: Such notification must be received by the Exchange's Officials within the timeframes specified below:
rule_cn: 此类通知必须在以下规定的时间范围内送达交易所官员：

rule: (A) Customer Orders. For an execution of a Customer order, a filing must be received by the Exchange within thirty (30) minutes of the execution, subject to sub-paragraph (C) below; and
rule_cn: （A）客户订单。对于客户订单的成交，交易所须在成交后三十（30）分钟内收到相关文件，但须遵守下述（C）款的规定；

rule: (B) "Non-Customer" Orders. For an execution of any order other than a Customer order, a filing must be received by the Exchange within fifteen (15) minutes of the execution, subject to sub-paragraph (C) below.
rule_cn: （B）“非客户”订单。对于任何非客户订单的成交，交易所须在成交后十五（15）分钟内收到相关文件，但须遵守下述（C）款的规定。

rule: (C) Linkage Trades. Any other options exchange will have a total of forty-five (45) minutes for Customer orders and thirty (30) minutes for non-Customer orders, measured from the time of execution on the Exchange, to file with the Exchange for review of transactions routed to the Exchange from that options exchange and executed on the Exchange ("linkage trades"). This includes filings on behalf of another options exchange filed by a third-party routing broker if such third-party broker identifies the affected transactions as linkage trades. In order to facilitate timely reviews of linkage trades the Exchange will accept filings from either the other options exchange or, if applicable, the third-party routing broker that routed the applicable order(s). The additional fifteen (15) minutes provided with respect to linkage trades shall only apply to the extent the options exchange that originally received and routed the order to the Exchange itself received a timely filing from the entering participant (i.e., within 30 minutes if a Customer order or 15 minutes if a non- Customer order).
rule_cn: （C）联动交易。其他期权交易所将为客户订单提供总共45分钟的申报时间，为非客户订单提供总共30分钟的申报时间，从在交易所执行交易的时间开始计算，用于向交易所提交申报，以供审核从该期权交易所路由至交易所并在交易所执行的交易（“联动交易”）。这包括由第三方路由经纪商提交的、代表另一期权交易所的申报，如果该第三方经纪商识别出相关交易为联动交易。为便于及时审核联动交易，交易所将接受由另一期权交易所或，如适用，路由相关订单的第三方路由经纪商提交的申报。关于联动交易所增加的15分钟申报时间，仅在最初接收并路由订单至交易所的期权交易所本身从成交参与人处及时收到申报时（即客户订单在30分钟内、非客户订单在15分钟内）才适用。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMethod = 联动交易 AND OperationPart = 客户订单 AND Action = 申报 AND Time <= 45分钟 AND Event = 在交易所执行交易的时间开始计算 AND Action = 提交申报 AND OperationPart = 交易所 AND Action = 审核 AND OperationPart = 从该期权交易所路由至交易所并在交易所执行的交易 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF TradingMethod = 联动交易 AND OperationPart = 非客户订单 AND Action = 申报 AND Time <= 30分钟 AND Event = 在交易所执行交易的时间开始计算 AND Action = 提交申报 AND OperationPart = 交易所 AND Action = 审核 AND OperationPart = 从该期权交易所路由至交易所并在交易所执行的交易 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF TradingMethod = 联动交易 AND Actor = 第三方路由经纪商 AND Action = 提交申报 AND OperationPart = 代表另一期权交易所 AND Constraint = 第三方经纪商识别出相关交易为联动交易 THEN Result = 成功

rule 4
IF TradingMethod = 联动交易 AND Action = 审核 AND Constraint = 及时 AND Actor = 另一期权交易所 OR Actor = 第三方路由经纪商 AND Action = 提交申报 THEN Result = 成功

rule 5
IF TradingMethod = 联动交易 AND Constraint = 增加的15分钟申报时间 AND Event = 最初接收并路由订单至交易所的期权交易所本身从成交参与人处及时收到申报 AND ((OperationPart = 客户订单 AND Time <= 30分钟) OR (OperationPart = 非客户订单 AND Time <= 15分钟)) THEN Result = 成功

if 操作主体 = 第三方路由经纪商 and 约束 = 第三方经纪商识别出相关交易为联动交易 and 操作 = 提交申报 and 交易方式 = 联动交易 and 操作部分 = 代表另一期权交易所

then 结果 = 成功
rule 5
if 操作主体 = 第三方路由经纪商 and 约束 = 及时 and 操作 = 审核 and 操作 = 提交申报 and 交易方式 = 联动交易
then 结果 = 成功
rule 6
if 时间 <= 30分钟 and 约束 = 增加的15分钟申报时间 and 事件 = 最初接收并路由订单至交易所的期权交易所本身从成交参与人处及时收到申报 and 交易方式 = 联动交易 and 操作部分 = 客户订单
then 结果 = 成功
rule 7
if 时间 <= 15分钟 and 约束 = 增加的15分钟申报时间 and 事件 = 最初接收并路由订单至交易所的期权交易所本身从成交参与人处及时收到申报 and 交易方式 = 联动交易 and 操作部分 = 非客户订单
then 结果 = 成功

rule: (3) Acting on Own Motion. The President or designee thereof, who is an officer of the Exchange (collectively "Exchange officer") may review a transaction believed to be erroneous on his/her own motion in the interest of maintaining a fair and orderly market and for the protection of investors. A transaction reviewed pursuant to this paragraph may be nullified or adjusted only if it is determined by the Exchange officer that the transaction is erroneous in accordance with the provisions of this Rule, provided that the time deadlines of sub-paragraph (c)(2) above shall not apply. The Exchange officer shall act as soon as possible after becoming aware of the transaction, and ordinarily would be expected to act on the same day that the transaction occurred. In no event shall the Exchange officer act later than 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time on the next trading day following the date of the transaction in question. A party affected by a determination to nullify or adjust a transaction pursuant to this provision may appeal such determination in accordance with paragraph (k) below; however, a determination by an Exchange officer not to review a transaction or determination not to nullify or adjust a transaction for which a review was conducted on an Exchange officer's own motion is not appealable. If a transaction is reviewed and a determination is rendered pursuant to another provision of this Rule, no additional relief may be granted under this provision.
rule_cn: （3）自主行动。交易所的主席或其指定人员（统称为“交易所官员”）可出于维护公平、有序市场及保护投资者利益的考虑，自行决定审查其认为存在错误的交易。根据本条款进行审查的交易，只有在交易所官员确定该交易存在错误并符合本规则的相关规定时，方可被撤销或调整，但上述第（c）（2）款的时间限制不适用。交易所官员应在获悉该交易后尽快采取行动，通常应于该交易发生当日处理完毕。无论如何，交易所官员不得迟于该交易发生当日之后下一个交易日的东部时间上午8:30采取行动。如根据本条款作出撤销或调整交易的决定，受影响的当事人可根据下文第（k）款的规定提出上诉；然而，交易所官员决定不审查某交易，或决定不撤销或调整经其自行决定审查的交易，此类决定不得上诉。如果交易已根据本规则的其他条款进行了审查并作出了决定，则根据本条款不得再给予其他救济措施。

rule: (4) Adjust or Bust. If it is determined that an Obvious Error has occurred, the Exchange shall take one of the actions listed below. Upon taking final action, the Exchange shall promptly notify both parties to the trade electronically or via telephone.
rule_cn: （4）调整或破产。如果确定发生了明显错误，交易所应采取以下列出的其中一项措施。在采取最终行动后，交易所应立即通过电子方式或电话通知交易双方。

rule: (A) Non-Customer Transactions. Where neither party to the transaction is a Customer, the execution price of the transaction will be adjusted by the Official pursuant to the table below. Any non-Customer Obvious Error exceeding 50 contracts will be subject to the Size Adjustment Modifier defined in sub-paragraph (a)(4) above.
rule_cn: （A）非客户交易。如果交易双方均非客户，则交易的成交价格将根据下表由官方进行调整。任何非客户明显错误交易数量超过50张的，将适用上述（a）（4）款中定义的规模调整修正系数。

rule: Theoretical Price (TP) Buy Transaction Adjustment - Sell Transaction Adjustment - TP TP Plus Minus Below $3.00 $0.15 $0.15 At or above $3.00 $0.30 $0.30
rule_cn: 理论价格（TP）买入交易调整 - 卖出交易调整 - TP 上下调整 低于 3.00 美元 0.15 美元 0.15 美元 3.00 美元及以上 0.30 美元 0.30 美元

rule: (B) Customer Transactions. Where at least one party to the Obvious Error is a Customer, the execution price of the transaction will be adjusted by the Official pursuant to the table immediately above. Any Customer Obvious Error exceeding 50 contracts will be subject to the Size Adjustment Modifier defined in sub-paragraph (a)(4) above. However, if such adjustment(s) would result in an execution price higher (for buy transactions) or lower (for sell transactions) than the Customer’s limit price,the trade will be nullified, subject to subparagraph (C) below.
rule_cn: (B) 客户交易。如果至少有一方为客户，交易的成交价格将根据上表由官方进行调整。任何超过50张合约的客户明显错误交易，将适用上述（a）（4）段中定义的规模调整修正系数。然而，如果此类调整会使成交价格（对于买方交易而言）高于客户限价，或（对于卖方交易而言）低于客户限价，则该交易将被取消，但需受下述（C）段的约束。
trl:
rule 1
IF Actor = 客户 AND Action = 交易 AND Constraint = 至少有一方为客户 THEN Result = 成交价格由官方调整

rule 2
IF Actor = 客户 AND Action = 明显错误交易 AND Quantity > 50 AND TradingInstrument = 合约 THEN Result = 适用规模调整修正系数

rule 3
IF Actor = 客户 AND Action = 调整 AND TradingDirection = 买入 AND Result > 客户限价 THEN Result = 交易取消

rule 4
IF Actor = 客户 AND Action = 调整 AND TradingDirection = 卖出 AND Result < 客户限价 THEN Result = 交易取消
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 客户 and 约束 = 至少有一方为客户 and 操作 = 交易
then 结果 = 成交价格由官方调整
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 客户 and 交易品种 = 合约 and 操作 = 明显错误交易 and 数量 > 50
then 结果 = 适用规模调整修正系数
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 客户 and 操作 = 调整 and 交易方向 = 买入 and 结果 > 客户限价
then 结果 = 交易取消
rule 4
if 操作主体 = 客户 and 操作 = 调整 and 交易方向 = 卖出 and 结果 < 客户限价
then 结果 = 交易取消

rule: (C) If any Participant submits requests to the Exchange for review of transactions pursuant to this Rule, and in aggregate that Participant has 200 or more Customer transactions under review concurrently and the orders resulting in such transactions were submitted during the course of 2 minutes or less, where at least one party to the Obvious Error is a non- Customer, the Exchange will apply the non- Customer adjustment criteria set forth in sub-paragraph (A) above to such transactions.
rule_cn: （C）如果任何参与者根据本规则向交易所提交交易审核请求，且该参与者同时正在审核的客户交易数量累计达到200笔或以上，并且导致这些交易的订单是在2分钟或更短的时间内提交的，且至少有一方存在明显错误的交易当事人是非客户，那么交易所将按照上述（A）项中规定的非客户调整标准，对该交易进行调整。

rule: (d) Catastrophic Errors.
rule_cn: (d) 灾难性错误。

rule: (1) Definition. For purposes of this Rule, a Catastrophic Error will be deemed to have occurred when the execution price of a transaction is higher or lower than the Theoretical Price for the series by an amount equal to at least the amount shown below: Theoretical Price Minimum Amount Below $2.00
rule_cn: （1）定义。为本规则之目的，当交易的成交价格与该系列理论价格之间的差额等于或超过以下所示的最低金额时，将被视为发生了重大错误：理论价格最低金额低于2.00美元。

rule: (2) Time Deadline. A party that believes that it participated in a transaction that was the result of a Catastrophic Error must notify the Exchange's Officials in the manner specified from time to time by the Exchange on its website. Such notification must be received by the Exchange's Officials by 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time on the first trading day following the execution. For transactions in an expiring options series that take place on an expiration day, a party must notify the Exchange's Officials within 45 minutes after the close of trading that same day.
rule_cn: （2）时间期限。如果一方认为其参与了一项因重大错误而产生的交易，必须按照交易所不时在其网站上规定的程序，通知交易所官员。此类通知须在交易执行后首个交易日的东部时间上午8:30前送达交易所官员。对于在到期日进行的到期期权系列交易，相关方须在当日交易结束后45分钟内通知交易所官员。

rule: (3) Adjust or Bust. If it is determined that a Catastrophic Error has occurred, the Exchange shall take action as set forth below. Upon taking final action, the Exchange shall promptly notify both parties to the trade electronically or via telephone. In the event of a Catastrophic Error, the execution price of the transaction will be adjusted by the Official pursuant to the table below. Any Customer order subject to this sub-paragraph will be nullified if the adjustment would result in an execution price higher (for buy transactions) or lower (for sell transactions) than the Customer's limit price.
rule_cn: （3）调整或破产。如果确定发生了灾难性错误，交易所应按照以下规定采取行动。在采取最终行动后，交易所应立即通过电子方式或电话通知交易双方。在发生灾难性错误的情况下，交易的成交价格将根据下表由官方进行调整。如果调整后的成交价格高于买方的限价（对于买入交易）或低于卖方的限价（对于卖出交易），则受本条款约束的客户订单将被取消。

rule: Buy Transaction Adjustment - Sell Transaction Adjustment - TP Theoretical Price (TP) TP Plus Minus Below $2.00 $0.50 $0.50 $2.00 to $5.00 $1.00 $1.00 Above $5.00 to $10.00 $1.50 $1.50 Above $10.00 to $20.00 $2.00 $2.00 Above $20.00 to $50.00 $2.50 $2.50 Above $50.00 to $100.00 $3.00 $3.00 Above $100.00 $4.00 $4.00
(e) Significant Market Events.
rule_cn: (e) 重大市场事件。

rule: (1) Definition. For purposes of this Rule, a Significant Market Event will be deemed to have occurred when: criterion (A) below is met or exceeded or the sum of all applicable event statistics, where each is expressed as a percentage of the relevant threshold in criteria (A) through (D) below, is greater than or equal to 150% and 75% or more of at least one category is reached, provided that no single category can contribute more than 100% to the sum and any category contributing more than 100% will be rounded down to 100%. All criteria set forth below will be measured in aggregate across all exchanges.
rule_cn: （1）定义。为本规则之目的，当满足以下标准（A）或达到或超过该标准，或所有适用的事件统计数据之和（每个统计指标均以以下标准（A）至（D）中相关阈值的百分比形式表示）大于或等于150%，并且至少有一个类别达到或超过75%时，将被视为发生重大市场事件。但需注意，任何单一类别对总和的贡献不得超过100%，若某一类别贡献超过100%，则将其向下取整至100%。以下所有标准均在所有交易所范围内进行汇总计算。

rule: (A) Transactions that are potentially erroneous would result in a total Worst-Case Adjustment Penalty of $30,000,000, where the Worst- Case Adjustment Penalty is computed as the sum, across all potentially erroneous trades, of: (i) $0.30 (i.e., the largest Transaction Adjustment value listed in sub-paragraph (e)(3)(A) below); times (ii) the contract multiplier for each traded contract; times (iii) the number of contracts for each trade; times (iv) the appropriate Size Adjustment Modifier for each trade, if any, as defined in sub-paragraph (e)(3)(A) below. (B) Transactions involving 500,000 options contracts are potentially erroneous; (C) Transactions with a notional value (i.e., number of contracts traded multiplied by the option premium multiplied by the contract multiplier) of $100,000,000 are potentially erroneous; (D) 10,000 transactions are potentially erroneous.
rule_cn:
（A）可能出错的交易将导致总计为30,000,000美元的最坏情况调整罚金，其中最坏情况调整罚金的计算方法为：对所有可能出错的交易进行汇总，计算以下各项的总和：（i）0.30美元（即下文子项（e）（3）（A）中列出的最大交易调整值）；乘以（ii）每笔交易合约的合约乘数；乘以（iii）每笔交易的合约数量；乘以（iv）每笔交易的适当规模调整系数（如有），该系数在下文子项（e）（3）（A）中定义。

（B）涉及500,000份期权合约的交易属于可能出错的交易；

（C）名义价值（即交易合约数量乘以期权溢价再乘以合约乘数）达到100,000,000美元的交易属于可能出错的交易；

（D）10,000笔交易属于可能出错的交易。

rule: (2) Coordination with Other Options Exchanges. To ensure consistent application across options exchanges, in the event of a suspected Significant Market Event, the Exchange shall initiate a coordinated review of potentially erroneous transactions with all other affected options exchanges to determine the full scope of the event. When this paragraph is invoked, the Exchange will promptly coordinate with the other options exchanges to determine the appropriate review period as well as select one or more specific points in time prior to the transactions in question and use one or more specific points in time to determine Theoretical Price. Other than the selected points in time, if applicable, the Exchange will determine Theoretical Price in accordance with paragraph (b) above.
rule_cn: （2）与其他期权交易所的协调。为确保在各期权交易所以及在发生疑似重大市场事件时，能够一致地执行相关措施，交易所应启动与所有受影响的其他期权交易所的协调审查，以确定可能错误交易的全部范围。当适用本条款时，交易所应迅速与其他期权交易所协调，以确定适当的审查期间，并选择一个或多个特定的时间点，这些时间点应早于相关交易发生的时间，并据此确定理论价格。除所选时间点外，如适用，交易所应按照上述第（b）款的规定确定理论价格。

rule: (3) Adjust or Bust. If it is determined that a Significant Market Event has occurred then, using the parameters agreed as set forth in sub-paragraph (e)(2) above, if applicable, an Official will determine whether any or all transactions under review qualify as Obvious Errors. The Exchange shall take one of the actions listed below with respect to all transactions that qualify as Obvious Errors pursuant to sub-paragraph (c)(1) above. Upon taking final action, the Exchange shall promptly notify both parties to the trade electronically or via telephone.
rule_cn: （3）调整或破产。如果确定发生了重大市场事件，那么根据上文第（e）（2）款中约定的参数（如适用），官方将决定正在审查的交易中是否有任何或全部交易构成明显错误。交易所应就所有符合上文第（c）（1）款规定的明显错误交易，采取下列措施之一。在采取最终措施后，交易所应立即通过电子方式或电话通知交易双方。

rule: (A) The execution price of each affected transaction will be adjusted by an Official to the price provided below unless both parties agree to adjust the transaction to a different price or agree to bust the trade. In the context of a Significant Market Event, any error exceeding 50 contracts will be subject to the Size Adjustment Modifier defined in subparagraph (a)(4) above.
rule_cn: （A）受影响的每一笔交易的成交价格将由官方调整为以下所列价格，除非交易双方同意将交易调整为其他价格或同意取消交易。在发生重大市场事件的情况下，任何超过50张合约的误差将适用上述（a）（4）款中定义的规模调整修正因子。
trl:
rule 1
IF Event = 受影响的交易 AND Operation = 成交价格调整 AND Action = 官方调整 AND Price = 以下所列价格 THEN Result = 成功

rule 2
IF Event = 受影响的交易 AND Actor = 交易双方 AND Action = 同意调整 AND Price = 其他价格 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF Event = 受影响的交易 AND Actor = 交易双方 AND Action = 同意取消 THEN Result = 成功

rule 4
IF Event = 重大市场事件 AND Quantity > 50 AND TradingInstrument = 合约 AND Constraint = 误差 THEN Constraint = 适用规模调整修正因子
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 事件 = 受影响的交易 and 操作 = 官方调整 and 价格 = 以下所列价格 and Operation = 成交价格调整
then 结果 = 成功
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 交易双方 and 事件 = 受影响的交易 and 操作 = 同意调整 and 价格 = 其他价格
then 结果 = 成功
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 交易双方 and 事件 = 受影响的交易 and 操作 = 同意取消
then 结果 = 成功
rule 4
if 交易品种 = 合约 and 约束 = 误差 and 事件 = 重大市场事件 and 数量 > 50
then 约束 = 适用规模调整修正因子

rule: Buy Transaction Adjustment - Sell Transaction Adjustment - TP Theoretical Price (TP) TP Plus Minus Below $3.00 $0.15 $0.15 At or above $3.00 $0.30 $0.30
rule_cn: 买入交易调整 - 卖出交易调整 - 理论价格（TP） TP 上下浮动低于 3.00 美元 0.15 美元 0.15 美元 3.00 美元及以上 0.30 美元 0.30 美元

rule: (B) Where at least one party to the transaction is a Customer, the trade will be nullified if the adjustment would result in an execution price higher (for buy transactions) or lower (for sell transactions) than the Customer's limit price.
rule_cn: （B）如果交易的一方至少为客户，当调整后的成交价格（对于买入交易而言）高于客户限价，或（对于卖出交易而言）低于客户限价时，该交易将被取消。
trl:
rule 1
IF Actor = 交易的一方 AND Actor in 客户 AND TradingDirection = 买入 AND Price = 调整后的成交价格 AND Price > Price = 客户限价 THEN Result = 取消

rule 2
IF Actor = 交易的一方 AND Actor in 客户 AND TradingDirection = 卖出 AND Price = 调整后的成交价格 AND Price < Price = 客户限价 THEN Result = 取消
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 交易的一方 and 操作主体 in 客户 and 交易方向 = 买入 and 价格 = 调整后的成交价格 and 价格 > 价格 = 客户限价
then 结果 = 取消
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 交易的一方 and 操作主体 in 客户 and 交易方向 = 卖出 and 价格 = 调整后的成交价格 and 价格 < 价格 = 客户限价
then 结果 = 取消

rule: (4) Nullification of Transactions. If the Exchange, in consultation with other options exchanges, determines that timely adjustment is not feasible due to the extraordinary nature of the situation, then the Exchange will nullify some or all transactions arising out of the Significant Market Event during the review period selected by the Exchange and other options exchanges consistent with this paragraph. To the extent the Exchange, in consultation with other options exchanges, determines to nullify less than all transactions arising out of the Significant Market Event, those transactions subject to nullification will be selected based upon objective criteria with a view toward maintaining a fair and orderly market and the protection of investors and the public interest.
rule_cn: （4）交易无效化。如果交易所与其他期权交易所协商后认为，由于特殊情况的特殊性，无法及时进行调整，则交易所将无效化在所选定的审查期间内，因重大市场事件而产生的部分或全部交易。如果交易所与其他期权交易所协商后决定无效化因重大市场事件而产生的交易中的一部分，则将根据客观标准选择需无效化的交易，以维护一个公平有序的市场，并保护投资者和公众利益。

rule: (5) Final Rulings. With respect to rulings made pursuant to this paragraph, the number of affected transactions is such that immediate finality is necessary to maintain a fair and orderly market and to protect investors and the public interest.
rule_cn: （5）最终裁决。根据本段作出的裁决，受影响交易的数量使得立即作出最终裁决成为必要，以维持一个公平、有序的市场，并保护投资者和公众利益。

rule: Accordingly, rulings by the Exchange pursuant to this paragraph are non-appealable.
rule_cn: 因此，根据本款作出的交易所裁定不可上诉。

rule: (f) Trading Halts. The Exchange shall nullify any transaction that occurs during a trading halt in the affected option on the Exchange pursuant to Supplementary Material .02 of this Rule.
rule_cn: (f) 交易暂停。交易所应取消在受影响期权上根据本规则补充材料.02规定的交易暂停期间发生的任何交易。

rule: (g) Erroneous Print in Underlying. A trade resulting from an erroneous print(s) disseminated by the underlying market that is later nullified by that underlying market shall be adjusted or busted as set forth in sub-paragraph (c)(4) of this Rule, provided a party notifies the Exchange's Officials in a timely manner as set forth below. For purposes of this paragraph, a trade resulting from an erroneous print(s) shall mean any options trade executed during a period of time for which one or more executions in the underlying security are nullified and for one second thereafter. If a party believes that it participated in an erroneous transaction resulting from an erroneous print(s) pursuant to this paragraph it must notify the Exchange's Officials within the timeframes set forth in sub-paragraph (c)(2) above, with the allowed notification timeframe commencing at the time of notification by the underlying market(s) of nullification of transactions in the underlying security. If multiple underlying markets nullify trades in the underlying security, the allowed notification timeframe will commence at the time of the first market's notification.
rule_cn: (g) 基础市场错误报价。因基础市场发布的错误报价（或错误报价）而产生的交易，若该基础市场随后撤销了这些交易，则应按照本规则第（c）（4）款的规定进行调整或取消，前提是相关方及时按照下文规定通知交易所官员。在本条款中，“因错误报价（或错误报价）产生的交易”是指在某一时间段内进行的期权交易，该时间段内基础证券的一个或多个成交被撤销，并且持续时间不超过一秒。如果一方认为其参与了根据本条款因错误报价（或错误报价）而产生的错误交易，必须在上述第（c）（2）款规定的时间范围内通知交易所官员，允许通知的时间段从基础市场（或市场）通知撤销基础证券交易的时间开始计算。如果多个基础市场撤销了基础证券的交易，则允许通知的时间段从第一个市场发出通知的时间开始计算。

rule: (h) Erroneous Quote in Underlying. A trade resulting from an erroneous quote(s) in the underlying security shall be adjusted or busted as set forth in subparagraph (c)(4) this Rule, provided a party notifies the Exchange's Officials in a timely manner as set forth below. An erroneous quote occurs when the underlying security has a width of at least $1.00 and has a width at least five times greater than the average quote width for such underlying security during the time period encompassing two minutes before and after the dissemination of such quote. For purposes of this paragraph, the average quote width shall be determined by adding the quote widths of sample quotations at regular 15-second intervals during the four-minute time period referenced above (excluding the quote(s) in question) and dividing by the number of quotes during such time period (excluding the quote(s) in question). If a party believes that it participated in an erroneous transaction resulting from an erroneous quote(s) pursuant to this paragraph it must notify the Exchange's Officials in accordance with sub-paragraph (c)(2) above.
rule_cn: （h）基础证券中的错误报价。由于基础证券中出现错误报价而导致的交易，应按照本规则第（c）（4）项的规定进行调整或取消，前提是相关方按照下文所述及时通知交易所官员。当基础证券的报价宽度至少为1.00美元，并且该报价宽度至少是该基础证券在该报价发布前两分钟和后两分钟这一时间段内，平均报价宽度的五倍时，即视为发生了错误报价。在本条款中，平均报价宽度应通过在上述四分钟时间段内，按每15秒间隔选取的样本报价的宽度之和（排除争议报价）除以该时间段内的报价数量（排除争议报价）来计算。如果一方认为其参与了因本条款所述错误报价而导致的错误交易，必须按照上述第（c）（2）项的规定通知交易所官员。

rule: (i) Linkage Trades. If the Exchange routes an order pursuant to the Plan (as defined in Options 5, Section 1(16)) that results in a transaction on another options exchange (a "Linkage Trade") and such options exchange subsequently nullifies or adjusts the Linkage Trade pursuant to its rules, the Exchange will perform all actions necessary to complete the nullification or adjustment of the Linkage Trade.
rule_cn: (i) 联动交易。如果交易所根据计划（如第5项第1(16)条所定义）路由订单，导致在另一家期权交易所发生交易（称为“联动交易”），且该期权交易所随后根据其规则取消或调整该联动交易，那么交易所将采取所有必要措施以完成该联动交易的取消或调整。

rule: (j) Verifiable Disruption or Malfunction of Exchange Systems. Parties to a trade may have a trade nullified or its price adjusted if it resulted from a verifiable disruption or malfunction of Exchange execution, dissemination, or communication systems that caused a quote/order to trade in excess of its disseminated size (e.g. a quote/order that is frozen, because of an Exchange system error, and repeatedly traded). Parties to a trade may have a trade nullified or its price adjusted if it resulted from a verifiable disruption or malfunction of an Exchange dissemination or communication system that prevented a Member from updating or canceling a quote/order for which the Member is responsible where there is Exchange documentation providing that the Member sought to update or cancel the quote/order.
rule_cn: (j) 可验证的交易系统中断或故障。如果交易因可验证的交易所执行、发布或通信系统的中断或故障而发生，且该故障导致报价或订单的成交数量超过其发布的数量（例如，由于交易所系统错误导致报价或订单被冻结，并反复成交），则交易双方可能有权要求取消该交易或调整交易价格。此外，如果交易因可验证的交易所发布或通信系统的中断或故障而发生，且该故障导致会员无法更新或取消其负责的报价或订单，而交易所文件证明该会员曾试图更新或取消该报价或订单，则交易双方可能有权要求取消该交易或调整交易价格。

rule: (k) Appeals. A party to a transaction affected by a decision made under this section may appeal that decision to the Exchange Review Council. An appeal must be made in writing, and must be received by NOM within thirty (30) minutes after the person making the appeal is given the notification of the determination being appealed, except that if such notification is made after 3:30 p.m. Eastern Time, either party has until 9:30 a.m. Eastern Time on the next trading day to request a review. The Exchange Review Council panel shall review the facts and render a decision on the day of the transaction, or the next trade day in the case where a request is properly made after 3:30 p.m. on the day of the transaction or where the request is properly made the next trade day. The Exchange Review Council may review any decision appealed, including whether a complaint was timely, whether an Obvious Error or Catastrophic Error occurred, whether the correct Theoretical Price was used, and whether an adjustment was made at the correct price.
rule_cn: (k) 上诉。任何受本条规定决定影响的交易方，均可向交易所复核委员会提出对该决定的上诉。上诉须以书面形式提出，并且应在上诉方收到所要上诉决定通知后的三十（30）分钟内提交至NOM，除非该通知是在东部时间下午3:30之后发出的，此时任一方可在下一个交易日东部时间上午9:30之前提出复核请求。交易所复核委员会将审查相关事实，并在交易当日或在交易日当天下午3:30之后或下一个交易日提出复核请求的情况下，于交易当日或下一个交易日作出决定。交易所复核委员会可审查所有上诉决定，包括但不限于：投诉是否及时、是否发生了明显错误或灾难性错误、是否使用了正确的理论价格，以及是否以正确的价格进行了调整。

rule: (1) A Nasdaq Review Council panel will be comprised minimally of representatives of one (1) member engaged in Market Making and two (2) industry representatives not engaged in Market Making. At no time should a review panel have more than 50% members engaged in Market Making.
rule_cn: （1）纳斯达克审查委员会小组成员至少应包括一名从事做市业务的会员代表和两名不从事做市业务的行业代表。在任何情况下，审查小组中从事做市业务的成员不得超过50%。

rule: (2) The Nasdaq Review Council, pursuant to the standards set forth in this Rule, shall affirm, modify, or reverse the determination.
rule_cn: （2）纳斯达克审查委员会应根据本规则所规定的标准，确认、修改或推翻该决定。

rule: (3) The decision of the Nasdaq Review Council pursuant to an appeal, or a determination by a Nasdaq Official that is not appealed, shall be final and binding upon all parties and shall constitute final Nasdaq action on the matter in issue. Any determination by a Nasdaq Official or the Nasdaq Review Council shall be rendered without prejudice as to the rights of the parties to the transaction to submit their dispute to arbitration.
rule_cn: （3）纳斯达克审查委员会根据上诉作出的决定，或纳斯达克官员作出且未被上诉的决定，均为最终且具有约束力的决定，对所有相关方均具有约束力，并构成纳斯达克就该事项的最终行动。纳斯达克官员或纳斯达克审查委员会作出的任何决定，均不得视为影响相关方就争议提交仲裁的权利。

rule: (4) The party initiating the appeal shall be assessed a $500.00 fee if the Nasdaq Review Council upholds the decision of the Nasdaq Official. In addition, in instances where Nasdaq, on behalf of an Options Participant, requests a determination by another market center that a transaction is clearly erroneous, Nasdaq will pass any resulting charges through to the relevant Options Participant.
rule_cn: （4）如果纳斯达克审查委员会维持纳斯达克官方的决定，发起上诉的一方将被收取500.00美元的费用。此外，在纳斯达克代表期权参与者要求另一市场中心裁定某笔交易明显存在错误的情况下，纳斯达克将把由此产生的所有相关费用转嫁给相应的期权参与者。

rule: Supplementary Material to Options 3, Section 20 .01 For the purposes of this Rule, to the extent the provisions of this Rule would result in the Exchange applying an adjustment of an erroneous sell transaction to a price lower than the execution price or an erroneous buy transaction to a price higher than the execution price, the Exchange will not adjust or nullify the transaction, but rather, the execution price will stand.
rule_cn: 第3项第20.01节补充材料：就本规则而言，如果本规则的规定会导致交易所将错误的卖出交易调整至低于成交价，或将错误的买入交易调整至高于成交价，交易所将不进行调整或取消该交易，而是维持原成交价不变。

rule: .02 Trading Halts. Trades on the Exchange will be nullified when: (A) The trade occurred during a trading halt in the affected option on the Exchange; (B) Respecting equity options (including options overlying ETFs), the trade occurred during a regulatory halt as declared by the primary market for the underlying security; or (C) Respecting index options, the trade occurred during a trading halt on the primary market in underlying securities representing more than 10 percent of the current index value for stock index options.
rule_cn:
.02 交易暂停。当出现以下情况时，交易所的交易将被取消：  
（A）交易发生在交易所相关期权的交易暂停期间；  
（B）对于股票期权（包括基于交易所交易基金（ETF）的期权），交易发生在基础证券主要市场宣布的监管暂停期间；或  
（C）对于指数期权，交易发生在主要市场中，代表当前股票指数价值超过10%的基础证券的交易暂停期间。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = 交易所 AND Event = 交易暂停 AND Time in 交易所相关期权的交易暂停期间 THEN Result = 取消

rule 2
IF TradingInstrument = 股票期权 OR TradingInstrument = 基于交易所交易基金_ETF_的期权 AND Event = 交易暂停 AND Time in 基础证券主要市场宣布的监管暂停期间 THEN Result = 取消

rule 3
IF TradingInstrument = 指数期权 AND TradingMarket = 主要市场 AND Event = 交易暂停 AND Constraint = 代表当前股票指数价值超过10百分号的基础证券的交易暂停期间 THEN Result = 取消

rule 1
if 交易市场 = 交易所 and 时间 in 交易所相关期权的交易暂停期间 and 事件 = 交易暂停
then 结果 = 取消
rule 2
if 交易品种 = 股票期权 and 时间 in 基础证券主要市场宣布的监管暂停期间 and 事件 = 交易暂停
then 结果 = 取消
rule 3
if 交易品种 = 基于交易所交易基金_ETF_的期权 and 时间 in 基础证券主要市场宣布的监管暂停期间 and 事件 = 交易暂停
then 结果 = 取消
rule 4
if 交易品种 = 指数期权 and 交易市场 = 主要市场 and 约束 = 代表当前股票指数价值超过10百分号的基础证券的交易暂停期间 and 事件 = 交易暂停
then 结果 = 取消

rule: .03 Exchange Determining Theoretical Price. For purposes of this Rule, when the Exchange must determine Theoretical Price pursuant to sub-paragraphs (b)(1)-(3) of this Rule (i.e., at the open, when there are no valid quotes or when there is a wide quote), then the Exchange will determine Theoretical Price as follows.
rule_cn: 03 交易所确定理论价格。根据本规则，当交易所必须根据本规则第（b）款第（1）至（3）项（即开盘时、没有有效报价时或出现宽幅报价时）确定理论价格时，交易所将按照以下方式确定理论价格。

rule: (A) The Exchange will request Theoretical Price from the third party vendor defined in paragraph (d) below ("TP Provider") to which the Exchange and all other options exchanges have subscribed. The Exchange will apply the Theoretical Price provided by the TP Provider, except as otherwise described below.
rule_cn: （A）交易所将向下列第（d）段中定义的第三方供应商（“理论价格提供方”）请求提供理论价格，该第三方供应商为交易所及所有其他期权交易所所订阅的服务商。除下文另有说明外，交易所将采用理论价格提供方所提供的理论价格。

rule: (B) To the extent an Official of the Exchange believes that the Theoretical Price provided by the TP Provider is fundamentally incorrect and cannot be used consistent with the maintenance of a fair and orderly market, the Official shall contact the TP Provider to notify the TP Provider of the reason the Official believes such Theoretical Price is inaccurate and to request a review and correction of the calculated Theoretical Price. The Exchange shall also promptly provide electronic notice to other options exchanges that the TP Provider has been contacted consistent with this paragraph and include a brief explanation of the reason for the request.
rule_cn: （B）如果交易所官员认为TP提供商提供的理论价格从根本上是错误的，无法用于维持公平有序的市场，该官员应联系TP提供商，通知其认为该理论价格不准确的原因，并要求对计算出的理论价格进行复核和更正。交易所还应及时向其他期权交易所发出电子通知，说明已按照本条的规定联系了TP提供商，并简要说明提出此要求的原因。

rule: (C) An Official of the Exchange may determine the Theoretical Price if the TP Provider has experienced a systems issue that has rendered its services unavailable to accurately calculate Theoretical Price and such issue cannot be corrected in a timely manner.
rule_cn: （C）交易所的官员在TP提供方因系统问题导致其无法准确计算理论价格且该问题无法及时解决的情况下，可确定理论价格。

rule: (D) The current TP Provider to which the Exchange and all other options exchanges have subscribed is: CBOE Livevol, LLC. Neither the Exchange, the TP Provider, nor any affiliate of the TP Provider (the TP Provider and its affiliates are referred to collectively as the "TP Provider"), makes any warranty, express or implied, as to the results to be obtained by any person or entity from the use of the TP Provider pursuant to this Supplementary Material .03. The TP Provider does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the calculated Theoretical Price. The TP Provider disclaims all warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose or use with respect to such Theoretical Price. Neither the Exchange nor the TP Provider shall have any liability for any damages, claims, losses (including any indirect or consequential losses), expenses, or delays, whether direct or indirect, foreseen or unforeseen, suffered by any person arising out of any circumstance or occurrence relating to the use of such Theoretical Price or arising out of any errors or delays in calculating such Theoretical Price.
rule_cn: (D) 当前交易所及所有其他期权交易所订阅的TP提供商为：CBOE Livevol, LLC。交易所、TP提供商及其任何关联方（统称为“TP提供商”）均不对任何人或实体依据本补充材料第03项使用TP提供商所获得的结果作出任何明示或暗示的保证。TP提供商不对计算得出的理论价格的准确性或完整性作出保证。TP提供商明确否认就该理论价格的适销性或适用于特定目的或用途的任何保证。无论该损害、索赔、损失（包括任何间接或后果性损失）、费用或延误是否可预见或不可预见，均由交易所或TP提供商均不对此类损失承担任何责任，无论该损失是直接还是间接，均因使用该理论价格或因计算该理论价格时出现的任何错误或延误而产生。

rule: Section 21. Access to and Conduct on NOM
rule_cn: 第21条 非洲开发银行（NOM）的访问及行为规范

rule: (a) Access to NOM. Unless otherwise provided in the Rules, no one but a Participant or a person associated with a Participant shall effect any NOM Transactions. The Exchange may share any Participant-designated risk settings in the Trading System with the Clearing Participant that clears transactions on behalf of the Participant.
rule_cn: (a) 访问NOM。除非本规则另有规定，任何NOM交易只能由参与者或与参与者有关联的人员执行。交易所可将参与者指定的风险设置信息与代表该参与者进行交易清算的清算参与者共享。

rule: (b) NOM Conduct. Participants and persons employed by or associated with any Participant, while using the facilities of NOM, shall not engage in conduct: (i) inconsistent with the maintenance of a fair and orderly market; (ii) apt to impair public confidence in the operations of the Exchange; or (iii) inconsistent with the ordinary and efficient conduct of business. Activities that shall violate the provisions of this paragraph (b) include, but are not limited to, the following: (1) failure of a Market Maker to provide quotations in accordance with Options 2, Section 5 of these Rules; (2) failure of a Market Maker to bid or offer within the ranges specified by Options 2, Section 4 of these Rules; (3) failure of a Participant to supervise a person employed by or associated with such Participant adequately to ensure that person's compliance with this paragraph (b). (4) failure to maintain adequate procedures and controls that permit the Options Participant to effectively monitor and supervise the entry of orders by users to prevent the prohibited practices set forth in this paragraph (b) and Options 9, Section 2 of these Rules; (5) failure to abide by a determination of Nasdaq Regulation; (6) effecting transactions that are manipulative as provided in General 9, Section 1 or any other rule of the Exchange; (7) refusal to provide information requested by Nasdaq Regulation; and (8) failure to abide by the provisions of the sections of this Options 3, Section 22 related to limitations on orders.
rule_cn: (b) 行为规范。任何参与者及其雇员或与之有关联的人员，在使用NOM设施时，不得从事以下行为：(i) 与维护公平、有序的市场相违背；(ii) 可能损害公众对交易所运作的信心；或(iii) 与业务的正常、高效运作相违背。违反本段(b)规定的行为包括但不限于以下情况：(1) 市场做市商未能按照本规则第5条第2款的规定提供报价；(2) 市场做市商未能在本规则第4条第2款规定的价格范围内进行报价或报单；(3) 参与者未能充分监督其雇员或关联人员，以确保其遵守本段(b)的规定；(4) 未能建立适当的程序和控制措施，以有效监控和监督用户订单的输入，防止本段(b)及本规则第9条第2款中规定的违规行为；(5) 未能遵守纳斯达克监管机构的决定；(6) 从事根据第9条第1款或交易所其他任何规则所界定的操纵性交易；(7) 拒绝向纳斯达克监管机构提供所要求的信息；以及(8) 未能遵守本规则第3条第22款中有关订单限制规定的条款。

rule: (c) Subject to the Rules, NOM will provide access to the Trading System to Options Participants in good standing that wish to conduct business on NOM.
rule_cn: （c）除规则另有规定外，NOM将向希望在NOM开展业务且信誉良好的期权参与者提供进入交易系统的权限。

rule: (d) Pursuant to the Rules and the arrangements referred to in this Rule, Nasdaq Regulation may: (1) suspend an Options Participant's access to the Trading System following a warning which may be made in writing or verbally (and subsequently confirmed in writing); or (2) terminate an Options Participant's access to the Trading System by notice in writing.
rule_cn: (d) 根据本规则及本规则所指的安排，纳斯达克监管机构可能：(1) 在发出警告（该警告可以是书面或口头形式，并随后以书面形式确认）后，暂停期权参与者的交易系统访问权限；或 (2) 通过书面通知终止期权参与者的交易系统访问权限。

rule: Section 22. Limitations on Order Entry
rule_cn: 第22条 订单输入限制

rule: (a) Limitations on Principal Transactions. With respect to orders routed to NOM, Options Participants may not execute as principal orders they represent as agent unless (i) agency orders are first exposed on NOM for at least one (1) second or (ii) the Options Participant has been bidding or offering on NOM for at least one (1) second prior to receiving an agency order that is executable against such bid or offer. With respect to Price Improving Orders, the exposure requirement of subsection (i) is satisfied if the displayable portion of the order is displayed at its displayable price for one second.
rule_cn: (a) 主交易限制。对于提交至NOM的订单，期权参与者不得以做市商身份执行其代表经纪商身份的订单，除非满足以下任一条件：(i) 该经纪商订单首先在NOM上展示至少1秒；或 (ii) 期权参与者在收到可与其报价或要约成交的经纪商订单之前，已在NOM上进行至少1秒的报价或要约。对于价格改善订单，若订单的可显示部分以可显示价格展示至少1秒，则满足第(i)项中的展示要求。
trl:
rule 1
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Actor = 期权参与者 AND Action = 执行 AND Status = 做市商身份 AND Status = 代表经纪商身份 AND NOT (Event = 经纪商订单在NOM上展示 AND Time >= 1秒) AND NOT (Event = 期权参与者进行报价或要约 AND Time >= 1秒 AND Event = 收到可与其报价或要约成交的经纪商订单) THEN Result = 失败

rule 2
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Actor = 期权参与者 AND Action = 执行 AND Status = 做市商身份 AND Status = 代表经纪商身份 AND Event = 经纪商订单在NOM上展示 AND Time >= 1秒 THEN Result = 成功

rule 3
IF TradingMarket = NOM AND Actor = 期权参与者 AND Action = 执行 AND Status = 做市商身份 AND Status = 代表经纪商身份 AND Event = 期权参与者进行报价或要约 AND Time >= 1秒 AND Event = 收到可与其报价或要约成交的经纪商订单 THEN Result = 成功

rule 4
IF TradingMethod = 价格改善订单 AND OperationPart = 可显示部分 AND Status = 以可显示价格展示 AND Time >= 1秒 THEN Constraint = 满足第(i)项中的展示要求
trl_postprocess:
rule 1
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 事件 != 经纪商订单在NOM上展示 and 事件 != 期权参与者进行报价或要约 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 失败
rule 2
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 1秒 and 事件 != 期权参与者进行报价或要约 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 失败
rule 3
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 1秒 and 时间 < 1秒 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 失败
rule 4
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 < 1秒 and 事件 != 收到可与其报价或要约成交的经纪商订单 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 失败
rule 5
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 >= 1秒 and 事件 = 经纪商订单在NOM上展示 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 成功
rule 6
if 操作主体 = 期权参与者 and 交易市场 = NOM and 时间 >= 1秒 and 事件 = 期权参与者进行报价或要约 and 事件 = 收到可与其报价或要约成交的经纪商订单 and 操作 = 执行 and 状态 = 做市商身份 and 状态 = 代表经纪商身份
then 结果 = 成功
rule 7
if 时间 >= 1秒 and 交易方式 = 价格改善订单 and 操作部分 = 可显示部分 and 状态 = 以可显示价格展示
then 约束 = 满足第i项中的展示要求

rule: (1) This Rule prevents Options Participants from executing agency orders to increase its economic gain from trading against the order without first giving other trading interest on NOM an opportunity to either trade with the agency order or to trade at the execution price when the Options Participant was already bidding or offering on the book. However, the Exchange recognizes that it may be possible for an Options Participant to establish a relationship with a customer or other person to deny agency orders the opportunity to interact on NOM and to realize similar economic benefits as it would achieve by executing agency orders as principal. It will be a violation of this Rule for an Options Participant to be a party to any arrangement designed to circumvent this Rule by providing an opportunity for a customer to regularly execute against agency orders handled by the Options Participant immediately upon their entry into NOM.
rule_cn: （1）本规则旨在防止期权参与者在未给予其他交易利益方在NOM（国家期权市场）上与代理指令进行交易或以成交价格进行交易的机会之前，通过执行代理指令来增加其交易所得的经济利益。然而，交易所认识到，期权参与者有可能与客户或其他个人建立某种关系，以阻止代理指令在NOM上进行互动，从而获得与执行代理指令作为经纪人的经济利益相当的收益。如果期权参与者参与任何旨在规避本规则的安排，例如在代理指令进入NOM后立即为客户提供执行机会，从而让客户定期与该代理指令进行交易，这种行为将被视为违反本规则。

rule: (b) Limit Orders. Options Participants shall not enter Public Customer limit orders into the System in the same options series, for the account or accounts of the same or related beneficial owners, in such a manner that the beneficial owner(s) effectively is operating as a market maker by holding itself out as willing to buy and sell such options contract on a regular or continuous basis. In determining whether a beneficial owner effectively is operating as a market maker, the Exchange will consider, among other things: the simultaneous or near-simultaneous entry of limit orders to buy and sell the same options contract and the entry of multiple limit orders at different prices in the same options series.
rule_cn: (b) 限价指令。期权参与者不得在同一期权系列中，为同一或关联受益人的账户输入公开客户限价指令，以使受益人实际上充当市场做市商，通过表明自己愿意定期或持续地买卖该期权合约。在判断受益人是否实际上充当市场做市商时，交易所将考虑以下因素，包括但不限于：同时或几乎同时输入买入和卖出同一期权合约的限价指令，以及在同一期权系列中以不同价格输入多个限价指令。

rule: (c) Limitations on Solicitation Orders. An Options Participant may not execute an order it represents as agent on NOM against orders solicited from members and non-member broker-dealers, whether such solicited orders are entered into NOM directly by the Options Participant or by the solicited party (either directly or through another Options Participant), if the Options Participant fails to expose orders on NOM as required by this Rule.
rule_cn: (c) 对招揽订单的限制。如果期权参与者未能按照本规则的要求在NOM上披露订单，那么该期权参与者不得执行其代表NOM代理的订单，这些订单是其从会员及非会员经纪商处招揽来的。无论这些招揽订单是由期权参与者直接在NOM上输入，还是由招揽方（直接或通过另一期权参与者）输入，均适用此限制。

rule: (d) Prior to or after submitting an order to NOM, an Options Participant cannot inform another Options Participant or any other third party of any of the terms of the order for purposes of violating this Rule.
rule_cn: (d) 在向NOM提交订单之前或之后，期权参与者不得向其他期权参与者或任何第三方透露订单的任何条款，以免违反本规则。

rule: Section 23. Data Feeds and Trade Information
rule_cn: 第23节 数据流与交易信息

rule: (a) The following data feeds are offered by NOM:
rule_cn: (a) 以下数据源由NOM提供：

rule: (1) Nasdaq ITCH to Trade Options (ITTO) is a data feed that provides full order and quote depth information for individual orders and quotes on the NOM book and last sale information for trades executed on NOM. The data provided for each options series includes the symbols (series and underlying security), put or call indicator, expiration date, the strike price of the series, and whether the option series is available for trading on NOM and identifies if the series is available for closing transactions only. The feed also provides order imbalances on opening/reopening (size of matched contracts and size of the imbalance).
rule_cn: （1）纳斯达克ITCH到交易期权（ITTO）是一种数据流，它提供NOM簿中单个订单和报价的完整订单和报价深度信息，以及在NOM上执行的交易的最后成交信息。对于每一系列期权，该数据流提供的信息包括：符号（系列和标的证券）、看跌或看涨指示符、到期日、该系列的执行价，以及该期权系列是否可在NOM上进行交易，以及该系列是否仅限于闭市交易。该数据流还提供开盘/重新开盘时的订单不平衡情况（匹配合约数量和不平衡数量）。

rule: (2) Best of Nasdaq Options (BONO) is a data feed that provides the NOM Best Bid and Offer and last sale information for trades executed on NOM. The data provided for each options series includes the symbols (series and underlying security), put or call indicator, expiration date, the strike price of the series, and whether the option series is available for trading on NOM and identifies if the series is available for closing transactions only.
rule_cn: （2）纳斯达克期权最佳报价（BONO）是一项数据服务，提供在NOM平台上执行交易的期权合约的NOM最佳买价和卖价以及最后成交信息。对于每个期权系列，所提供的数据包括：符号（系列和标的证券）、看涨或看跌标识、到期日、该系列的执行价格，以及该期权系列是否可在NOM平台上进行交易，同时还标识该系列是否仅限于平仓交易。

rule: (b) The following order and execution information is available to Participants:
rule_cn: (b) 参与者可获得以下订单和执行信息：

rule: (1) Clearing Trade Interface ("CTI") is a real-time clearing trade update message that is sent to a Participant after an execution has occurred and contains trade details specific to that Participant. The information includes, among other things, the following: (i) The Clearing Member Trade Agreement or "CMTA" or The Options Clearing Corporation or "OCC" number; (ii) Exchange badge or house number; (iii) the Exchange internal firm identifier; (iv) an indicator which will distinguish electronic and non-electronically delivered orders; (v) liquidity indicators and transaction type for billing purposes; and (vi) capacity.
rule_cn: （1）清算交易接口（“CTI”）是一种实时清算交易更新消息，该消息在交易执行后发送给参与者，并包含与该参与者相关的具体交易细节。该信息包括但不限于以下内容：（i）清算会员交易协议（“CMTA”）或期权清算公司（“OCC”）编号；（ii）交易所徽章或内部编号；（iii）交易所内部的机构标识符；（iv）用于区分电子订单和非电子订单的指示符；（v）用于计费的流动性指示符和交易类型；以及（vi）交易权限。

rule: (2) TradeInfo, a user interface, permits a Participant to: (i) search all orders submitted in a particular security or all orders of a particular type, regardless of their status (open, canceled, executed, etc.); (ii) cancellation of open orders at the order, port or firm mnemonic level; (iii) a view of orders and executions; and (iv) download of orders and executions for recordkeeping purposes.
rule_cn: (2) 交易信息（TradeInfo）是一个用户界面，允许参与者：(i) 搜索某一特定证券的所有订单，或某一特定类型的全部订单，无论其状态（如未成交、已取消、已成交等）；(ii) 在订单、交易端口或公司代码级别取消未成交订单；(iii) 查看订单和成交记录；以及 (iv) 为存档记录目的下载订单和成交数据。

rule: (3) FIX DROP is a real-time order and execution update message that is sent to a Participant after an order been received/modified or an execution has occurred and contains trade details specific to that Participant. The information includes, among other things, the following: (i) executions; (ii) cancellations; (iii) modifications to an existing order and (iv) busts or post-trade corrections.
rule_cn: （3）FIX DROP 是一种实时订单和成交更新消息，当订单被接收/修改或发生成交后，会发送给参与者，并包含与该参与者相关的具体交易详情。该信息包括但不限于以下内容：（i）成交信息；（ii）撤销信息；（iii）现有订单的修改信息；（iv）异常成交或交易后更正信息。

rule: (4) QUO DROP provides real-time information regarding orders entered through QUO and the execution of those orders. The QUO DROP data feed is not a trading interface and does not accept order messages.
rule_cn: (4) QUO DROP 提供有关通过 QUO 输入的订单及其执行的实时信息。QUO DROP 数据流不是一个交易接口，也不会接受订单信息。

rule: (c) The following trade information is available on an End of Day, Intra-Day, and historical basis:
rule_cn: (c) 以下贸易信息可基于当日结束时、日内以及历史数据进行提供：

rule: (1) Nasdaq Options Trade Outline provides aggregate quantity and volume information for trades on the Exchange for all series during a trading session. Information is provided in the following categories: (i) total exchange volume for Intra-Day information and total exchange and industry volume for End of Day information for each reported series; (ii) open interest for the series; (iii) aggregate quantity of trades and aggregate trade volume effected to open a position, characterized by origin type (Customer, Broker-Dealer, Market Maker, Firm, and Professional), and for Customers and Professionals, further subdivided by trade size buckets; and (iv) aggregate quantity of trades and aggregate trade volume effected to close a position, characterized by origin type (Customer, Broker-Dealer, Market Maker, Firm, and Professional), and for Customers and Professionals, further subdivided by trade size buckets.
rule_cn: （1）纳斯达克期权交易概要为交易日中所有系列的交易所交易总量和交易量提供汇总信息。信息按以下类别提供：（i）对于每个报告系列，提供日内信息的总交易所交易量以及日终信息的总交易所交易量和行业交易量；（ii）系列的未平仓合约量；（iii）开仓交易的总交易量和总交易金额，按交易来源类型（客户、经纪商-交易商、做市商、公司及专业机构）进行分类，并且对于客户和专业机构，进一步按交易规模区间细分；（iv）平仓交易的总交易量和总交易金额，按交易来源类型（客户、经纪商-交易商、做市商、公司及专业机构）进行分类，并且对于客户和专业机构，进一步按交易规模区间细分。

rule: Nasdaq Options Trade Outline End of Day will also provide opening buy, closing buy, opening sell and closing sell information, which shall include option first trade price, option high trade price, option low trade price, and option last trade price.
rule_cn: 纳斯达克期权交易大纲收盘时还将提供开仓买入、平仓买入、开仓卖出和平仓卖出的信息，包括期权首次成交价、最高成交价、最低成交价和最后成交价。

rule: End of Day information will be available the next business day. Intra-Day information is updated at 10-minute intervals over the course of the trading day. Historical information will be available upon request.
rule_cn: 当日结束信息将在下一个工作日提供。盘中信息在交易日中每10分钟更新一次。历史信息可应要求提供。

rule: Section 24. Transaction Price Binding The price at which an order is executed shall be binding notwithstanding that an erroneous report in respect thereto may have been rendered, or no report rendered. A report shall not be binding if an order was not actually executed but was reported to have been executed in error.
rule_cn: 第24条 交易价格约束 无论是否就订单的执行作出错误报告或未作出任何报告，订单的成交价格均具有约束力。如果订单实际上并未执行，但被错误地报告为已执行，则该报告不具有约束力。

rule: Section 25. Anonymity
rule_cn: 第25条 隐私权

rule: (a) Orders and quotes entered into the System will be displayed anonymously and, as such, will trade anonymously. Transaction reports produced by the System (i.e. the Clearing Trade Interface and the Trade Details report) will indicate the details of the transactions, and will include contra party identities.
rule_cn: (a) 系统中输入的订单和报价将匿名显示，因此交易也将匿名进行。系统生成的交易报告（即清算交易接口和交易详情报告）将显示交易的详细信息，并包含交易对手的身份信息。

rule: (b) Nasdaq shall reveal a Participant's identity in the following circumstances: (1) when a registered clearing agency ceases to act for a participant, or the Participant's clearing firm, and the registered clearing agency determines not to guarantee the settlement of the Participant's trades; (2) for regulatory purposes or to comply with an order of an arbitrator or court; (3) if both Participants to the transaction consent; (4) Unless otherwise instructed by a Member, Nasdaq will reveal to a member, no later than the end of the day on the date an anonymous trade was executed, when the member's Order has been decremented by another Order submitted by that same member.
rule_cn:
(b) 在以下情况下，纳斯达克应披露交易参与者的身份：  
(1) 当注册清算机构停止为某参与者或其清算机构提供服务，并且该注册清算机构决定不保证该参与者的交易结算时；  
(2) 为满足监管要求，或遵守仲裁员或法院的命令时；  
(3) 当交易双方参与者均同意时；  
(4) 除非另有指示，纳斯达克将在匿名交易执行当日的结束前，向会员披露其订单已被同一会员提交的另一订单所减少的情况。

rule: Section 26. Message Traffic Mitigation
rule_cn: 第26节 消息流量缓解

rule: (a) The Exchange shall disseminate an updated bid and offer price, together with the size associated with such bid and offer, when: (1) the Exchange's disseminated bid or offer price increases or decreases; (2) the size associated with the Exchange's disseminated bid or offer decreases; or (3) the size associated with the Exchange’s bid (offer) increases by an amount greater than or equal to a percentage (never to exceed 20%) of the size associated with previously disseminated bid (offer). Such percentage, which shall never exceed 20%, will be determined by the Exchange on an issue-by-issue basis and posted on the Exchange’s website.
rule_cn:
(a) 当出现以下情况时，交易所应当发布更新的买卖报价及其相应的数量：  
(1) 交易所发布的买卖报价价格发生上涨或下跌；  
(2) 交易所发布的买卖报价所对应的数量减少；或  
(3) 交易所的买方（或卖方）报价数量增加的幅度大于或等于此前发布买方（或卖方）报价数量的一定百分比（该百分比不得超过20%）。该百分比将由交易所按个券 basis（按每只证券分别）确定，并在交易所网站上公布。

rule: Section 27. Limitation of Liability
rule_cn: 第27条 责任限制

rule: (a) Except as provided for in Equity 2, Section 17, NOM and its affiliates shall not be liable for any losses, damages, or other claims arising out of the NOM Trading System or its use. Any losses, damages, or other claims, related to a failure of the NOM Trading System to deliver, display, transmit, execute, compare, submit for clearance and settlement, adjust, retain priority for, or otherwise correctly process an order, message, or other data entered into, or created by, the NOM Trading System shall be absorbed by the member, or the member sponsoring the customer, that entered the order, message, or other data into the NOM Trading System.
rule_cn: (a) 除《公平交易规则》第17条另有规定外，NOM及其关联公司不对因NOM交易系统或其使用而产生的任何损失、损害或其他索赔承担责任。与NOM交易系统未能正确处理订单、信息或其他数据有关的任何损失、损害或其他索赔，包括未能及时交付、显示、传输、执行、比较、提交清算与结算、调整、保留优先权或以其他方式正确处理订单、信息或其他数据的情况，均由输入该订单、信息或其他数据的会员，或赞助客户的会员承担。
